112b4(mdo 'grel): ming lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de la yang yan lag rgyas par bstan pa ni/ /gzhi lhun gyis grub pa la lnga ste/ /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /thugs kyi gzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /gsung gi gzhi lhun gyis grub pa dang/ /
112b5(mdo 'grel): yul gyi gzhi lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de yang gzhi lhun gyis grub pa ni/ /chos nyid kyi nam mkha' chen po/ /yongs su mi zad pa chen po/ /rol pa 'gag pa med pa/ /rgya chad kun dang bral ba de yin no/ /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la yang rnam
112b6(mdo 'grel): pa lnga ste/ sku rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /ye shes rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang/ sku dang ye shes gnyis su med pa rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang/ gsung rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang/ yul rang bzhin lhun gyis
112b7(mdo 'grel): grub pa'o/ /rang bzhin lhun grub la don rnam pa bzhi ste/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang rtsod pa'i dus su/ /rang na ci yin/ bzhan na ci yin/ lhun na ci yin/ grub na ci yin zhes byas la dri'o/ /mnga' bdag chen po 'di lta ste/
113a1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin lhun grub ngo bo ma shes na/ chos sku'i ngo bo bskal pa bgrangs kyang mi rnyed do/ /de yang rnam par phye ste bstan pa ni/ rang la rnam pa gsum yod de/ chos sku rang gi ngo bo dang/ /ye shes rang gi ngo bo dang
113a2(mdo 'grel): sku dang ye shes gnyis med rang gi ngo bo'o/ /bzhin la rnam pa gnyis yod de/ chos sku bzhin dang ldan pa dang/ /dkyil 'khor bzhin dang ldan pa'o/ /lhun gyis mtshan nyid bstan pa ni chos nyid rtsol ba kun dang bral ba na/ ma bcos
113a3(mdo 'grel): lhun gyis mtshan dang ldan/ /ma bsnan ma phri lhun gyis mtshan dang ldan/ /bcos med bslad med lhun gyis mtshan dang ldan/ /blo'i bya byed kun dang bral na lhun gyis mtshan dang ldan pa'o/ /grub kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ /chos
113a4(mdo 'grel): sku rtsol ba kun dang bral bar rang rig rang la shar/ rgyu rkyen gyis tshig las 'das par rang rig rang la shar/ byas pa'i 'bras bu yin pa rang rig rang la shar/ /rang bzhin lhun grub 'gyur ba med par rang rig rang la shar/ /
113a5(mdo 'grel): des na ma brtsal lhun gyis grub pa'i brda ru bstan pa'o// //yang rtsal gyi lhun grub bstan pa ni/ rtsal gyis lhun grub rnam gsum ste/ sku yi rtsal dang ye shes rtsal/ /sku dang ye shes gnyis med rtsal dang gsum
113a6(mdo 'grel): du bstan pa'o/ /sku yi brtsal gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni/ /snyan cha dang ni mgur chu dang/ /phyag dub dang ni zhabs gdub dang/ /dbu rgyan dang ni do shal dang/ /ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gsal bar shar ba yang/ /de yang sku ye
113a7(mdo 'grel): rtsal yin no/ /kha dogs lnga yid dkyil 'khor dang/ /rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal las khang/ /'byung chen sna lnga'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ /de yang sku yi rtsal yin no/ /ye shes rtsal gyi mtshan nyid mtshan pa ni/ kun tu tshol ba'i
113b1(mdo 'grel): yid dang gtan la 'bebs pa'i yid/ /nges par 'jog pa'i yid dang gsum po de/ /de gsum ye shes rtsal yin no/ /sku dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i rtsal gyi yan lag ni/ /sku yi yan lag kha dog lnga ru shar ba la/ /kun tu
113b2(mdo 'grel): tshol ba'i yid kyi ci yin brtag pa dang/ /gtan la 'bebs pa'i yid kyi kha dog dbyibs su phye/ /nges par 'jog pa'i yid kyis phye ba de la nges par gzung ba thams cad phyi yi yul la gzung/ /'dzin pa thams cad nang gi sems
113b3(mdo 'grel): la byung /sku yi rtsal dang ye shes rtsal/ /gnyis su med pa'i rtsal dang gsum po de/ /rtogs na sangs rgyas rgyu gcig gda' / /ma rtogs 'khor ba'i rgyu cig gda' / /rtogs na 'bras bu chen por gda' / /'dzin pa byung na lam
113b4(mdo 'grel): gyis 'khrul par gda' / /'dzin pa smin na sdug bsngal chen por gda' / /phyi la gzung ba'i yul dang nang la 'dzin pa'i sems/ /sems rgyas theg par bgrang ba min/ /'dzin pa byung na chos nyid gzung yang rnams rtog yin/
113b5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa med na dug lnga bcad kyang sgrib pa med/ /ye shes lnga dang dug lnga'i tshul/ /rmongs pa rnams la ltar snang tshul du phyi ba las/ /yang dag don dang 'jal ba'i rnal 'byor chen po la/ /ye shes lnga dang dug lngar phye ba med
113b6(mdo 'grel): dug lnga spangs pa'i pha rol nas/ /ye shes lnga la btsal thabs med/ /btsal bas rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ /brgya la brnyed kyang sangs rgyas theg pa min/ /'byung chen lnga yi dkyil 'khor spangs pa'i pha rol nas/ /ma bus dkyil
113b7(mdo 'grel): 'khor chen po btsal thabs med/ /zag pa can gyi lus spangs nas/ /yid bzhin sku la btsal thabs med/ /brgya la rnyed kyang sangs rgyas theg pa min/ /spong len thams cad 'khor ba'i chos yin pas/ /'khor ba'i chos la
114a1(mdo 'grel): brten par mi bya'o/ /mtshan ma dang sar grol na spong len bya mi dgos/ /spong ba dang ni len pa dang/ /sgyur dang sgrub dang 'gegs pa dang/ /snon pa dang ni 'brid pa dang/ /sangs rgyas theg par bgrang pa min/ /
114a2(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa rtsad nas chod cing lhun grub byed tsam na/ /blo yi bya byed mi dgos co ga bzhag pas chog pa'o// //yang ming gi lhun grub bstan pa ni/ /ming gi lhun grub rnam gsum ste/ /phyi yi ming gi lhun
114a3(mdo 'grel): grub dang/ /nang gi ming gi lhun grub dang/ /gsang ba'i ming gi lhun grub po/ /phyi yi ming? gi lhun grub bstan pa ni/ /kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin ye nas ming dang 'brel ba la/ /'khor lo gsum gyi bya byed kyi/ /ming med de la ming
114a4(mdo 'grel): du btags/ /ming gi 'khrul pa dngos por smin/ /ming gi btags tshul 'di lta ste/ /phyogs mtshams steng 'og bcu dang rin chen sna lnga yang/ /'byung chen lnga yi ming btags dngos por smin pa'o/ /nang gi ming gi lhun grub
114a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa ni/ /gting gsal chen po'i ngo bo sems ming med la/ /'khor lo gsum du yid g.yos pas/ /ming med de la ming btags ming gi 'khrul pa smin/ /ming gi btags tshul 'di lta ste/ /yan lag lnga yi ming dang dbang po
114a6(mdo 'grel): lnga yi ming/ /don snying lnga yi ming dang nang khrol lnga yi ming/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi ming dang nang lnga yi ming btags pas/ /nang la ming gi lhun grub dngos por smin pa'o/ /gsang ba'i ming gi lhun grub bstan pa ni/ /chos sku yon tan stong
114a7(mdo 'grel): ldan ma rigs pas/ /rang gsang thabs kyis chod pa'i shes rab mun pa can/ /rang mgo rang gis mchog pa'i shes rab mun pa can/ /rang brtson rang gis 'dzin pa'i shes pa mun pa can/ /mun pa'i gtibs nas bla mas ma bton na
114b1(mdo 'grel): rtag gi smag gi mun rum chen por nyal ba'o/ /mnga' bdag chen pos 'di ltar shes par gyis/ /lhun grub rnams la rtsod pa byed tsam na/ /bai ro tsa na ma yin pa/ /lhun grub phyed ba shin tu dka' ba'o/ /yang rtsod pa'i rtsod lugs 'di lta
114b2(mdo 'grel): ste/ /sdun gyi sa dang rdo dang shing dang gang yang rung ba la/ /lag tu blangs la lhun grub yin min dri/ /lhun grub yin gyis zer bar khas len na/ /chos kyi sku yi ngo bo lhun grub yin zer na/ /gci de dang mgo ba sgre skyon rnams tshang bar dag la/ chos sku lhun grub yin par na/
114b3(mdo 'grel): chos sku lhun grub yin pas sangs rgyas yul na med/ /smyon pa'i tshig dang 'dra ste kha zla bya ba min/ /byung ba'i lhun grub mi 'gyur rnam bzhi dang/ /byas pa'i lhun grub lnga bcu ma phyed na/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rtsod kyang rtsod pa shin tu dka' 
114b4(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i lhun grub kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen po 'di ltar shes par bya/ /sngon na 'dug pa'i mtshan ma'i chos rnams la/ /ci yang rung ba lag tu
114b5(mdo 'grel): blangs nas ni/ /'di'i ming ni ji skad yin zhes byas nas dri/ /sa dang gyo mog rdo la sogs pa de/ /sa yeng drang ste gyo mog yin zer na/ /gyo mog yin par ces shes byas la dri/ /gyo mog med du grangs pa yin zer na/ /thog ma med pa'i
114b6(mdo 'grel): dus nyid nas/ /gyo mog? de'i mchid nas/ /nga ni gyo mog yin zer ram /sems can blo'i chos kyis gyo mog ming du btags pa yin/ zhes byas la gnya' lag bsdams la dri'o/ /gyo mog rang nar gya mog yin zer na/ /de dang zer du
114b7(mdo 'grel): chug dang byas la dri'o/ /sems can gyis blos btags pa yin zer na/ /'o na gyo mog tu nges pa med de/ /gong du gyo mog yin zer ba dang 'gal byas la skyon tshar bar dgal lo/ /rang gi ded shes na skyon gnyis su chud pa yin no/ /thos kyang
115a1(mdo 'grel): thar mi srid do/ /yang khe sngar gyi skyon blangs nas/ /gyo mog 'di la khyod kyis 'dogs na ji ltar 'dogs zer na/ /ming du lhun gyis grub pa'i ngos nas/ /kho bo ni 'di la gyo mog tu 'dogs so/ /gyo mog yin
115a2(mdo 'grel): par cis shes zer na/ /dper na rdo grangs med pa'i nang du/ /gyo mog cig bcug nas byis pa shed ma byed gcig la yang gyo mog khyed la shog ces brjod na/ /gzhan ci dang yang nor pa med de/ /gyo mog min pa thams cad log
115a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ /de ma yin thams cad las log yin zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir na gyo mog ces bya'o/ /mi thams cad 'gyur ba yin pas don med zer na/ /kho bos gong du ming lhun grub yin byas pa zhes bya'o/ /mnga' bdag chen po
115a4(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /kha dog dkar dmar gang yang rung ba la/ /'di yi kha dog ci yin byas la dri/ /gang gi shes pa khong du chud par bya/ mnga' bdag chen po 'di lta ste/ phar la 'dri ba'i 'dri lugs 'di ltar shes par bya//
115a5(mdo 'grel): 'gro ba ris drug sems can gyi/ /skye ba dang ni rgas ba dang/ /na ba dang ni shi ba dang/ /pho dang mo ru byung ba 'di/ /nad ka gang gis phul zhing ci las byung ba bzhin/ /rang gi shes pa khong glong la/ /phar la gnad dang gags la
115a6(mdo 'grel): dri'o/ /tshur la dri na 'di ltar shes par bya/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nyid na/ /me long rnam pa gsum yod de/ /chos nyid do gyi me long dang/ /chos sku rang gsal me long dang/ /kun gzhi sems kyi me long dang/ /me long gsum
115a7(mdo 'grel): gyi nang? na snang srid gsal bar shar/ /chos nyid don gyi me long ni/ /dngos po mtshan ma ma yin kha dog dbyibs kyang min/ /don gyi ngo bo smra bsam yul las 'das/ /smra bsam blo yi yul las 'das pa de/ /mi skyod 'pho
115b1(mdo 'grel): ldeg med par gnas/ /ci yang med pas ma yin don chen sarba kho las 'byung/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i gzhi yang kho las 'byung/ /sangs rgyas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i gzhi yang kho las 'byung/ /'gro ba ris drug sems can ma
115b2(mdo 'grel): lus pa'i/ /snod bcud gnyis kyang kho las 'byung/ /chos nyid don gyi me long na/ /thams cad ma lus rdzogs par bstan/ /sarba ma lus gsal bar bstan/ /gsal yang nga la rang bzhin med par bstan/ /gsal yang de la ming
115b3(mdo 'grel): 'dog med par bstan/ /dper na 'o ma bzhos ma thag gi ngo bo la/ /mar gyi rang bzhin gzhi la gnas kyang bya ba med pa bzhin/ /de bzhin chos nyid don gyi me long na/ /lhan cig gnas ba gsum po de/ /ya nas gnas kyang phye ba
115b4(mdo 'grel): med par bstan/ /gang la khyab chen po'i ngo bor ya nas gnas par bstan pa'o/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i chos nyid don gyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pa/
115b5(mdo 'grel): kye slob dpon chen po lags/ chos sku rang gsal gyi me long bstan du gsol zhes zhus slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig /me long rnam gsum ma phye na/ dper na me btsun ngan pa'i la yos
115b6(mdo 'grel): par 'dra?/ /g.yos na mang yang zas kyi ro mchog stor/ /lag yas 'bar la byas pas dri ma slar la bslar/ /de bzhin me long rnam gsum ma byed cing/ /yas 'khrul gtan la ma phebs pa'i/ /mi skya phal pa slu ba'i ston pa
115b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ /re ba sangs rgyas 'bras bu de/ /ltung ba ngan song gsum du ltung/ /mtho rim gsum du 'gro ba dang/ /ngan song gsum du ltung ba gnyis/ /tha snyad ston pa rnams kyis ma phyed pas/ /'khor ba'i stod la mnan pa yin/ /mnga' 
116a1(mdo 'grel): bdag chen po 'di lta ste/ /chos sku rang gsal me long na/ /thams cad ma lus gsal bar ston/ /nga yis khyod la legs par bstan par bya/ /mnga' bdag yid la g.yeng ba ma byed par/ /me long gsum
116a2(mdo 'grel): la gsal ba 'di yin pas/ /lus ngag yid gsum gus ba'i sgo nas nyon/ /chos sku rang gsal me long skad pa 'di/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nyid na/ /sangs rgyas sems can ming yang med/ /'khor ba myang 'das ming yang med/ /
116a3(mdo 'grel): pho mo ma ning ming yang med/ /skyes pa rgas pa'i ming yang med/ /na ba shi ba'i ming yang med/ /chags sdang lnga yi ming yang med/ /ye shes lnga yi ming yang med/ /nyi ma shar nub ming yang med/ /kha dog dkar dmar ming yang med/ /me long
116a4(mdo 'grel): gsum gyi nang du mtshan nyid gsum du byung/ /gsung gi mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum du byung/ /thugs kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum du byung/ /yul gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum du byung/ /chos nyid me long gsal ba'i nang nyid na//
116a5(mdo 'grel): sku ni dmigs med chos kyi sku ru bzhugs/ /gsung ni g.yo med mi g.yo'i gsung du bzhugs/ /thugs ni rang gsal rtog pa med par bzhugs/ /yul ni chos nyid nam mkha' i yul du bzhugs/ /de ltar bzhugs par chos
116a6(mdo 'grel): sku rang gsal me long nang na gsal/ /chos sku rang gsal me long gsal ba'i nang nyid na/ /sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru bzhugs/ /gsung ni brag ca lta bu'i gsung du bzhugs/ /thugs ni skyi bser lta bu'i thugs su
116a7(mdo 'grel): bzhugs/ /yul ni sku yi rtsal gyi rnam par bzhugs/ /de ltar gsal ba'i me long nang nyid du/ /skyi bser lta bu'i thugs la ldang zhal byung ba na/ /sngar 'khrul ma myong dbang gi ldang nyal ngo ma shes chos sku rang gsal yon
116b1(mdo 'grel): tan rang gis rang ma rig /chos sku gsal ba'i yon tan skyon du shar/ /dper na rgya mtsho gting dpag ldan pa'i kha nyid du/ /seng ge mgo sprugs mche gtsigs gzengs bton pas/ /chu yi nang gi seng ge rang gi yon tan yin par rang
116b2(mdo 'grel): gis ma rig nas/ /rang gi ji ltar sprug pa bzhin du chu yi nang gi seng ges sprugs/ /nga la jo ba yin snyam nga rgyal shin tu skyes/ /nga rgyal skyes pa'i dbang gis chu yi nang du 'chongs/ /rang gis rang ma rig pas 'khrul tshabs
116b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu che/ /de bzhin me long gsal ba'i nang nyid du/ /chos sku kha dog dbyibs ldan gyi/ /chu yi nang du seng ge gzugs nyid gsal ba bzhin/ /sku yi rang bzhin shin tu gsal bar shar/ /gsal ba rang gi yon tan yin par
116b4(mdo 'grel): ma rig nas/ /dngos po cig la gnyis 'dzin byung ba 'grel chen nang ma gsal/ /rig pa'i ldang nyal ma rig pas/ /chags sdang lnga ru byung ba 'grel chen nang na gsal/ /dper na skyi bser lta'i thugs la ldang nyal byung ba yin
116b5(mdo 'grel): skyi bser lta'i thugs la ldang nyal byung ba las/ /skyes pa dang ni rgas pa dang/ /na ba dang ni shi ba dang/ /pho dang mo ru byung ba dang/ /nyi shar ba dang nyi ma nub pa dang/ /sa sros pa dang nam langs dang/ /rang gi rig pa'i lngar nyal
116b6(mdo 'grel): ma rig bas/ /'khrul pa'i rtsa ba yin par 'khor lo'i nang na gsal/ /chos sku gting gsal chen po'i yon tan las/ /kha dog lnga ru btags pa 'grel chen nang na gsal/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i ngo bo de/ /smra brjod
116b7(mdo 'grel): kun las 'das par 'grel chen nang na gsal/ /ming 'dogs kun dang bral ba 'grel chen nang na gang na gsal/ /sems? rtsis brdab gnyis dang 'das pa yin pa la/ /'khor lo gsum du yid g.yos pas/ /kun tu chol ba'i
117a1(mdo 'grel): yid kyis kun btsal nas/ /gtan la phebs pa'i yid kyis bsal dor gtan la phag? /nges par 'jog pa'i yid kyis bsam don nges par bzhag/ ma rig 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ye shes phyi ru
117a2(mdo 'grel): shar/ /ye shes phyi ru shar ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /kha dog lnga la ye nas ming med de/ /ming gi 'khrul bas dkar dmar la sogs lnga ru btags/ /med pa ma yin don chen ye shes nas snang/ /dkyil 'khor chen po ma bcos ye
117a3(mdo 'grel): nas snang/ /snang yang ming du gdags su rdul tsam med pa'o/ /ming du btags na rdo rje sems dpa' i bka' dang 'gal/ /gsal la reg bya med par ma shes na/ /kun tu bzang po'i don la chad pa yin/ /shel gyi khye'u chung zhal
117a4(mdo 'grel): nas de skad gsung/ /bai ro tsa'i blos btags ma yin no zhes gsungs so/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i chos sku rang gsal gyi me long bstan ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen pos
117a5(mdo 'grel): zhus pa/ kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /kun gzhi sems kyi me long bstan du gsol/ zhes zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig/ kun gzhi sems kyi me long du/ /sems kyi
117a6(mdo 'grel): 'char lugs brjod pa'i mi lang ste/ /bsdus nas rnam pa gsum du 'dus/ /sems nyid yid du 'char ba dang/ /sems nyid rtog par 'char ba dang/ /sems nyid ye shes chen por 'char ba'o/ /sems nyid yid du 'char
117a7(mdo 'grel): ba la yang rnam pa gsum yod/ /yid g.yo mi g.yo ru 'char ba dang/ /yid thos gang pa ru 'char ba dang/ /yid mi 'dogs nus par 'char ba'o/ /yang sems la rnam gsum
117b1(mdo 'grel): yod de/ /mar ldan sems su 'char ba dang/ /yang ldan sems su 'char ba dang/ /the tsom can gyi sems su 'char ba'o/ /mang ldan sems su 'char ba ni/ /ngan song gsum du spyod pa yin/ /yang ldan sems la 'char ba ni/ /mtho ris
117b2(mdo 'grel): gsum la gcod pa yin/ /the tshom can du 'char ba na/ /don byed gang yang nus pa min/ /'di ru sdug la phyi mar 'bras bu med pa'o/ /ye shes la yang rnam bzhi ste/ /sku yi ye shes bstan pa dang/ /gsung gi ye shes bstan
117b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /thugs kyi ye shes bstan pa dang/ /yul gyi ye shes bstan pa'o/ /ye shes bstan la 'bebs pa la/ /dpe dang tshig gi sgo nas don chen gtan la 'bebs/ /dpe la rnam gsum yod de/ /sku yi dpe dang thugs kyi dpe
117b4(mdo 'grel): yul gyi dpe dang gsum du bstan/ /gsung la dpe yis mi bstan shugs las chod pa yin/ /re zhig mtshon na brag ca lta bus mtshon/ /sku yi dpe ni man shel dag pa yin/ /thugs kyi dpe ni bskye bser lta
117b5(mdo 'grel): bu yin/ /yul gyi dpe ni gzha' tsho da lta bu yin/ /chos rnams sarba dpe yis mtshon la bstan/ /de rnams dpe yis ma mtshon na/ /rmongs pas go bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang dag don gyi ngo bo la/ /dpe yang mi 'tshal
117b6(mdo 'grel): don gyi chog /kun gzhi sems kyi me long gsal ba'i nang shes na/ /'gro drug bag chags gzugs ni shin tu gsal bar ston/ /yang bag chags la yang gsum yod de/ /dug lnga rgyas pa'i bag chags dang/ /'dus
117b7(mdo 'grel): byas chos kyi bag chags dang/ /ye shes chen po'i bag chags so/ /dug lnga rgyas pa'i bag chags mthu rtas pas/ /'bras bu ngan song gsum du lhung/ /gting gsal chen po chod na nges kyang sgrib pa med/ /dug lnga sangs ni
118a1(mdo 'grel): yi shes rgyas/ /dper na 'bod? da? nag po lta bu'i du'i chen la/ /sems can phal po rnams kyi zos gyur na/ /bzas ma yin pa rang gi lus srog 'bral/ /sbya? sdug rma bya'i shin tu sman chen yin/ /shin tu mdangs ?
118a2(mdo 'grel): ldan zhing gzi brjid che/ /de bzhin dug lnga'i rang bzhin kyang/ /'gro ba phal po'i sbyor yu min/ /dug lnga 'jom gab med par sbyar gyur na/ /rang sems tshod ma lta bur 'chod par nges/ /sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar nges
118a3(mdo 'grel): kyi nyung skad kyis 'od zer 'don par nges/ /don gsum khong du chud pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /ye shes lnga dug lngar? ? ba med/ /tha mal rnams kyis bltas pa'i dug lnga de/ /rnal 'byor chen po'i don la btsal tsam na/ /ye shes
118a4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i rtsal las ma gtogs pa/ /dug lnga logs kyi tha dad min par zhes/ /tha mal rnams kyi dug lnga'i ming gtags dang/ /bla ma'i gong mas dag ye shes lnga po gnyis/ /tha dad mad?  cing rgya chad med par shes/ /de ltar shes kyi
118a5(mdo 'grel): rnal 'byor la/ /gol ba bya ba'i ming yang med par rdo rje sems dpas gsungs/ /yang 'dus byas chos kyi bag chags bstan pa ni/ /sdig bcu rgyab tu bskyur nas reg bcu dang du len/ /dag bcu dang du blongs nas 'dzin pa chen por sbyo
118a6(mdo 'grel): dpang po rab tu gyur na gzhan gyi don la dmigs shing 'dzin pa chen por sbyor/ /dbang por 'bred du gyur na rang gi don la dmigs shing 'brin? pa chen por sbyor/ /dbang po tha mar gyur na 'jig rten 'di yis rkyan zlog don du dmigs shing/
118a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ba chen ba'i sbyong/ /mnga' bdag chen po 'di lta ste/ /skyon gyi rtsa ba gzungs 'dzin gnyis yin bas/ /'dus byas chos la dmigs pa'i gzung 'dzin chos spyod do/ /sangs rgyas theg bar 'grang ba min/ /de? dogs? gol sa mchod
118b1(mdo 'grel): gzung 'dzin gnyis bo de/ /skyen gyi rtsa bar ma shes shing/ /nang gi bla ma chen po dang/ /yang dang yang du ma 'jal na/ /bur de gzhan nas btsal bas rnyed par rdo rje sems dpas ma gsungs so/ /yang ye shes chen po'i bag chags bstan pa ni//
118b2(mdo 'grel): bla ma chen po'i gdams ngag rang dag rang la shar/ /rgyud dang lung dang bla ma'i gdams ngag dang/ /rang gi rig pa bzhi ru gyol 'grub med mthun na/ /gong du bstan pa'i ye shes bzhi? ?/ /de dogs med par rig pa nang nas? shar/ /gting
118b3(mdo 'grel): gsal chen po'i ngo bo de/ /ched dgar ma bcol shugs las dran ba'i tshe/ /mi bcos mi bslad ma bcos so mar bzhag /de yang mnga' bdag chen po 'di ltar shes par bya/ /dper na skyes bu mnga' rtsal can gyi mda'/ /dang? ba gang ba bka' ?
118b4(mdo 'grel): yang btad?  sa mde 'u rtse gang/ /de bzhin snang zhing srid ba'i chos rnams la/ /'khrul ba rtsad nas bcad cing theg sgo mang bstan yang/ /yang dag don la lta ba sgom pa gnyis/ /sbyod pa 'bras bu bzhi ru 'dus/ /bzhi la rang yang don chen gcig
118b5(mdo 'grel): tu 'dus/ /de yang 'di ltar shes par bya/ /chos sku kha dog dbyibs ldan de/ /tshe dkar ma btsal shugs las dran na lta ba yin/ /de la ma bcos gnas na sgom pa yin/ /gtings gsal yongs pa med na spyod pa yin/ /gting gsal chen
118b6(mdo 'grel): po'i ngo bo de/ /sangs rgyas sgom ste ma mdzad la/ /sems can sgrin te ma bcos/ /sems can rnams kyi blo las 'das pa de/ /dper na sgog skya dri bzhin du/ /ye nas rang chad yod par rang gis rig pa de/ /'bras bu chen po ma btsal
118b7(mdo 'grel): lhun gyis grub pa yin/ /btsal ba med par dbyings dang 'jal ba yin/ /sgrub pa med par don chen grub ba yin/ /bgrod pa med pa nges? tshan non pa yin/ /rtag na rtag tu bas te chos sku rtag ba yin/ /chad na chad du bas te rnam
119a1(mdo 'grel): rtog chad pa yin/ /bral na bral du bas te blo dang bral ba yin/ /stor na stor du pas te dug lnga stor ba yin/ /stongs na stong su bas te 'kho ba stongs pa yin/ /grol na grol du bas te mtshan ma grol ba yin/ /nub
119a2(mdo 'grel): na nub tu bas te sdug bsngal nub pa yin/ /sangs na sangs su bas te skyon rnam sangs pa yin/ /rgyas na rgyas su bas te yon tan rgyas pa yin/ stong na stong du bas te gzung 'dzin stong ba yin/ /rnyed na rnyed du bas te lhun grub rnyed
119a3(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ /'das na 'das su bas te mya ngan 'das pa yin pa'o/ /yul khyad du 'phags pa rgya gar gyi yul du/ /shel gyi khye'u chung zhal nas de skad gsungs/ /mnga' bdag blo la ma brjed brtan par gyis/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i
119a4(mdo 'grel): 'khor lo'i kun gzhi sems kyi me long bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pa/ kyi slob dpon chen po lags/ /'gro ba rigs drug sems can gyi/ /dbang po lnga yi
119a5(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ /rgyab tu ma chags bdun du chags pa ni/ /nang ka gang gis 'phul zhing ji ltar 'khrul ba lags zhes zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig /'gro ba'i dbang po rnams lnga mdun
119a6(mdo 'grel): du chags pa ni/ /chos sku'i ngo bo gdags bya kun las 'das pa yin mod kyang/ /mgo bo la brda' tsam tshig tshu mtshon pa yin/ /kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo gcig las tha mi dad pa la/ /phra rags rtsos ming? 'dogs gsum
119a7(mdo 'grel): du bstan pa yin/ /phra rags cis shing yang dag don dang ma sbyar na/ /'khrul pa tshong par rdo rje sems dpas ma gsungs so/ /kun tu bzang po'i phra rags bstan pa ni/ /kun tu bzang po'i phra rags rnams gsum ste/ /dbyibs
119b1(mdo 'grel): kyi kun tu bzang po bstan pa dang/ /zer gyi kun tu bzang po bstan pa dang/ /sprul pa'i kun tu bzang po bstan pa'o/ /dbyings kyi kun tu bzang po bstan pa ni/ /mi g.yo mi 'gyur chos nyid nam mkha' na/ /rol pa 'gag med mi zad mdzad
119b2(mdo 'grel): chen na/ /'gyur ba med pa'i zhing khams chen po ni /chos sku'i ngo bo rang gsal gzhan mi gsal bar bzhugs/ /mdza' dbus med pas dbyibs su bzhugs/ /dbyings kyi kun tu bzang po zhes kyis de la bya'o/ /zer gyi kun tu
119b3(mdo 'grel): bzang po bstan pa ni/ /chos sku rang gsal ngo bo 'gyur med la/ /g.yo mi g.yo las zer tsam g.yos/ /ye shes cha bra zer tsam g.yos pa las/ /zer gyis rang bzhin je rags je rags song/ /je rags song ba'i dbang gis
119b4(mdo 'grel): ming? 'dogs nus par byung/ /phyi'i snod dang nang gis bcud kyi ngo bo yang/ /gsal ba'i yon tan rgyas ba la/ /rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa ngo ma shes/ /ye shes phyi ru rgyas par shar/ /phyir la shar tshad kha gsal yin par nges//
119b5(mdo 'grel): phyi ru gsal bas phyi yi 'dzin pa byung/ /phyi yi rang bzhin shin tu gsal bar mthong/ /kha dog lnga yi rang bzhin gsal ba de/ /rgyab kyi ma mthong mdun gyis mthong bar bzung/ /ye shes lha la mdun rgyab med par mi rig pas/ /
119b6(mdo 'grel): dbang po lnga yang mdun du chags par des/ /phyi nang gnyis su gsal bar shes na gting gsal chen po yin/ /gtong gsal chen po'i ngo bo de/ /dper na nyi ma'i snying po bzhin/ /ma bltas par la gsal bar des/ /ma bltas rang?
119b7(mdo 'grel): la gsal? ma sangs rgyas nyag gcig yin bar nges/ /rang gi ngo bo mi gsal ba/ /phyi yi snang ba gsal na kha gsal yin/ /'gag med ma 'gag dbyer med bstan pa gsum/ /chos sku theg le nya gcig yin par ma
120a1(mdo 'grel): gtogs pas/ /zer gyi rang bzhin phyogs steng 'og phyogs mtshams med par 'gyur ba'o/ /sprul pa'i kun tu bzang po bstan pa ni/ /chos sku'i ngo bo ye nas 'gyur med la/ /zer gyi 'dzin pas sprul
120a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i sku ru shar/ /de yang ji ltar 'khrul par bstan pa ni/ /'gag med ma 'gags dbye med gsum po de/ /chos sku rgya ma chad du ma shes pas/ /chos sku'i rtsal la ye shes 'dzin pa byung/ /de yang rnam par phye ste bstan
120a3(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /chos sku'i rtsal gyi yan lag 'gag med la/ /ye shes rtsal bgyi yan lag ma 'gags kyis/ /sku'i rtsal la ye shes zer gyi rtsal snang gis/ /kha dog lnga la ming btags phyi yi snod du 'khrul/ /gsal ba lnga la ming
120a4(mdo 'grel): btag nang gi bcud du 'khrul/ /sku dang ye shes gnyis su med par ma rig pas/ /dngos po cig la gnyis 'dzin byung bas 'khrul pa'o/ /chos kyi sku la ya nas de las 'gyur med kyang/ /ltar snang tshul du 'gro ba rigs drug sku ru
120a5(mdo 'grel): snang/ /res 'ga' i tshe na ltar snang ngo bo la/ /lha dang lha ma yin du sku sprul nas/ /'dod yon lnga la longs spyod rgyas par spyod/ /res 'ga' mi dang byol song lus su sku sprul nas/ /chags sdang bcu la longs sbyong rgyas par
120a6(mdo 'grel): spyod/ /des 'ga' yi dags dmyal ba'i lus su sku sprul nas/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs sbyor/ /des na sprul pa'i kun tu bzang po zhes su bstan pa'o/ /kun tu bzang po phra rags phye 'gyur na/ /rtsod pa kun las grol bar
120a7(mdo 'grel): bstan pa'o/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i kun tu bzang po phra rags phye ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// /yang mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pa/ kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /'byung ba'i 'byung lugs
120b1(mdo 'grel): ji ltar 'byung ba dang/ /gnas pa'i gnas lugs ji ltar gnas pa bstan du gsol ces zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyin cig/ /'byung ba'i 'byung lugs bstan pa ni/ /'byung ba'i 'byung lugs
120b2(mdo 'grel): rnam pa gsum ste/ /chos nyid ma yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung ba dang/ /ma bu gnyis su med pa'i yon tan ji ltar 'byung bar bstan pa'o/ /yang chos nyid ma la yon tan 'byung lugs rnam gsum yod/ /'od kyi sku la thogs rdug med
120b3(mdo 'grel): par 'byung pa dang/ /rlung gi gsung la 'gag pa med par 'byung ba dang/ /rigs pa'i thugs la skye shi med par 'byung ba'o/ /chos nyid bu yi yon tan 'byung lugs rnam gsum ste/ /sku yi yon tan rgyan dang cha lugs 'byung ba dang//
120b4(mdo 'grel): thugs kyi yon tan rno la gcod par 'byung ba dang/ /gsal ba'i yon tan kha dog lnga ru 'byung ba'o/ /ma bu gnyis su med par 'byung ba'i yon tan rnam gsum ste/ /ngo bo tha dad rang bzhin gcig par 'byung ba dang/ /dper na chu yi
120b5(mdo 'grel): nang gi zla ba bzhin/ /snang la rang bzhin med par 'byung ba dang/ /reg bya'i thogs pa med pas nam mkha' chen por ye nas gcig par 'byung ba'o/ /dper na gzha' tshon gdang ba bzhin/ /ma 'bres yongs su rdzogs par ye nas
120b6(mdo 'grel): gcig/ /dper na rgya mtsho'i nang nyid du/ /nyi zla gza' skar rdzogs pa de/ /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa bzhin/ /ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs par ye nas cig/ /dper na shel dang rgyus pa bzhin/ /ngo bo 'dres pa med par ye nas
120b7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /dper na gang+ga'i chu bo bzhin/ /reg la ma 'byang ba ru ye nas gnas/ /rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ /chos nyid ma bu ma phyed cing/ /'khrul pa rtsad nas mchod na/ /yang dag don dang mjal ba shin tu dka' / /lhun grub
121a1(mdo 'grel): shan nas ma phyed cing/ /rang bzhin lhun grub ma rnyed na/ /yang dag don dang 'jal ba shin tu dkal/ /ngo sprod khong du ma chud cing/ /gting gsal chen po ma rtogs na/ /yang dag don dang mjal ba dka' o//
121a2(mdo 'grel): rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i 'byung pa'i 'byung lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pa/ /kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /byung ba'i byung lugs me bstan na/ /
121a3(mdo 'grel): rmongs pa rnams kyis go bar mi 'gyur bas/ /byung ba'i byung lugs bstan du gsol ces zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig /byung lugs la yang rnam gsum ste/ /ye shes
121a4(mdo 'grel): ming du byung ba dang/ /sems kyi ming du byung ba dang/ /dngos po'i ming du byung ba'o/ /ye shes su byung ba la yang rnam pa gsum yod/ /ye shes kyi ye shes su byung ba dang/ /ye shes kyi sems su byung ba dang/ /ye shes kyi
121a5(mdo 'grel): dngos por byang ba'o/ /ye shes su byung ba bstan pa ni/ /sku yi rgyu nyid ye nas ci yin shes pa dang/ /thugs kyi rgyu nyid ye nas ci yin shes pa dang/ /ye shes kyi ye shes su byung pa la yang rnam gsum ste/ /sku yi rgyu nyid ci
121a6(mdo 'grel): yin ye nas yid ches skyes pa med/ /yid ches snyam shing snyam byed chod pa med pa dang/ /gsung gi rgyud nyid ci yin snyam zhing snyam byed chod pa dang/ /thugs kyi rgyu nyid ci yin snyam zhing snyam byed chod pa'o/ /ye shes kyis dngos
121a7(mdo 'grel): por byung ba la yang rnam gsum ste/ /sku yi ngo bo dngos por byung ba dang/ /gsung gi ngo bo dngos por byung ba dang/ /thugs kyi ngo bo dngos por byung ba'o/ /ye shes kyi sems su byung ba la yang rnam gnyis te/ /sems kyi ngo
121b1(mdo 'grel): bo rnol gcod pa des/ /yar ldan ye shes lnga la spyod pa dang/ /mar ldan chags sdang lnga la spyod pa'o/ /de yang go bar bya ba'i brdal rnam pa gnyis/ /lung du bstan pa'i ye shes chen po dang/ /lung du ma bstan ye shes so/ /lung du bstan
121b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i ye shes bstan pa bla ma'i gdams ngag yin/ /lung du ma bstan pa'i ye shes chags sdang lnga bo yin/ /chags sdang lnga po'i rang bzhin yang/ /sus kyang bstan pa med par le nas shes pa'i ye shes yin/ /lung du bstan pa'i ye
121b3(mdo 'grel): shes la 'ang rnam lnga ste/ /me long lta bu'i ye shes brda ru bstan pa dang/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes brda ru bstan pa dang/ /so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes brda ru bstan pa dang/ /bya ba grub pa'i ye shes brda ru bstan pa dang/ /dbyibs nyid
121b4(mdo 'grel): stong pa'i ye shes brda ru bstan pa'o/ /brda de khong du chud na gzugs med khams nas ldog /des na sems kyi ye shes chen por bstan pa'o/ /yang na sems kyi sems su bstan pa ni/ /sems kyi sems la rnam gsum ste/ /sems  
121b5(mdo 'grel): kyi rang bzhin rnol gcod pa la/ /'khor lo gsum du yid g.yos pas/ /yid kyi rang bzhin ming 'dogs mang po la/ /ming la yid ches skye zhing yang dag dam par bzung/ /phyi yi yul dang nang gi bcud rnams la/ /ma bcos
121b6(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma rang sar? grol bar ma shes pas/ /mang la gtso ru bzung zhing ming la rtag tu spyad/ /de ni sems kyi sems su byung ba yin/ /yang sems kyi dngos por byung ba rnams gsum ste/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi lha gnas na/ /'dod
121b7(mdo 'grel): ba? yon lnga yi 'khrul snang la/ rtag gam snyam nas dngos por bzung/ /'dod yon lnga'i longs spyod chen po la/ /skad cig tsam ni dus gsum rtag tu g.yengs/ /yongs pa thams cad bdud kyi slu ba yin/ /lha yi bdung du 'dod yon lnga
122a1(mdo 'grel): byung bas/ /lha yi dbang po rang gi rig pa shin tu dka' / /lha bran rnams la smos ci dgos/ /mi rtag zhag bdun gong nas 'chi ba'i sgra byung ste/ /gong du brtson 'grus chen po ma bskyed pas/ /sdug
122a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal 'gyod pa skyes kyang bzlog ba shin tu dka' / /'dod yon lnga yi yon tan slu 'bring chen por 'byung ba'o/ /sems kyi dngos por 'dod yin lnga byung yang/ /mi rtag pa yi zhag bdun sgra byung bas/ /skad cig tsam yang bsdad?
122a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i glags med pas/ /'dod yon sems kyi ltar sdang? yin par des/ /des na sems kyi dngos po'i ming du btags pa'o/ /yang dngos po'i ye shes bstan pa ni/ /dngos po'i ye shes la yang rnam gsum ste/ /dngos po'i ye shes
122a4(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid ni/ /sems can rnams kyis gol sa yin par des/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis/ /lus sems yul dang gsum gyis ngo spyod kyis/ rig pa nang nas shar bas ye shes chen po nang nas shar/ /mtshan ma rang
122a5(mdo 'grel): sar gol bas ye shes chen po nang nas shar/ /srid pa rgya thegs byung bas ye shes chen po nang nas shar/ /sku gsum dbyer med rtogs pas ye shes rtogs pa'o/ /dngos po'i sems la rnam gsum ste/ /phyi yi yul la dngos
122a6(mdo 'grel): bor sems dpas dngos po'i sems/ /nang gi bcud la dngos por sems pas dngos po'i sems/ /gsang ba'i yid la dngos por sems pas dngos po'i sems/ /yang dngos po'i dngos po bstan pa ni/ /dngos po'i dngos
122a7(mdo 'grel): por byung ba rnam gsum ste/ /phyi yi yul la dngos por bzung bas dngos po'i sdug bsngal shar/ /nang gi bcud la dngos por bzung pas dngos po'i sdug bsngal shar/ /gsang ba'i yid la dngos por bzung bas dngos
122b1(mdo 'grel): bo'i sdug bsngal shar ba'o/ /yang phyi yi yul la ye nas dngos med la/ /yid kyi ming 'dogs smin pas dngos por smin pa yin/ /nang gi bcud la ye nas dngos med la/ /yid kyi ming 'dogs smin pas dngos por smin pa yin/ /gsang ba'i
122b2(mdo 'grel): yid la ye nas dngos med la/ /yid kyi ming 'dogs smin pas dngos por smin pa yin/ /dngos po sarba sdug bsngal rgyu yin pas/ /dngos po'i chos la ma spyod par/ /ches nyid zab mo khong du chud bar gyis/ /mda' bdag chen po 'di lta ste//
122b3(mdo 'grel): bsdum pas byas pa'i chos dang byung ba'i chos/ /byas pa'i chos rnams ji ltar zab kyang 'khor ba yin/ /byung ba'i chos shig ma shes na/ /byas pa'i chos la thug ba med pa'o/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i byung ba'i byung lugs bstan pa'i
122b4(mdo 'grel): le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// //yang mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pas/ kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma shes na/ /mkha' la rten med bya sgro rlung khyer 'dra/ /gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan du gsol
122b5(mdo 'grel): ces zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig /gnas sa la yang rnam gsum ste/ /chos kyi sku yi gnas sa bstan pa dang/ /longs spyod/ rdzogs sku'i gnas sa bstan pa dang/ /sprul pa'i sku
122b6(mdo 'grel): yi gnas sa bstan pa'o/ /yang chos sku'i gnas sa bstan pa ni/ /chos nyid nam mkha' mdzod? chen yin/ /rol pa 'gag med rgya chad med pa yin/ /mi g.yo mi 'gyur 'pho ldeg med pa yin/ /nam mkha' de'i mtshan nyid mdza' dbus
122b7(mdo 'grel): med cing phyogs dang bral ba yin/ /chos kyi sku'i zhing khams chen po yin zhes pa'o/ /longs spyod rdzogs sku'i gnas sa bstan pa ni/ /ma bris dkyil 'khor rgya chad med pa yin/ /kha dog gsal zhing nyams dang ldan pa yin//
123a1(mdo 'grel): bsgyur bas mi 'gyur nam mkha' rdo rje'i mtshan nyid yin/ /de dag? bya kun dang bral bas chos nyid pho brang yin/ /'od la mdza' med mdza' dang bral ba yin/ /shong dang mi shong pas phyogs ris med pa yin//
123a2(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' chen por gcig pas mdza' dbyibs bral ba yin/ /ma 'dres so sor gsal bas gzhal tshon? dang ba 'dra/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhing khams chen po bstan pa'o/ /yang sprul pa'i sku'i gnas sa bstan pa ni/ /'byung
123a3(mdo 'grel): chen lnga'i dkyil 'khor chen po yin/ /ri rab rtse mo ri bo'i khong gseng yin/ /ri'i mtho dman lung ba yangs dog yin/ /gling bzhi gling mtshams mun pa'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /bye mtshan mo dang rnag khrag rdzing bu yin/ /lcags
123a4(mdo 'grel): kyi shan ma ri dang spu gri so rnams yin/ /gang la ming btags ming gi 'dzin pas 'khrul pa'o/ /rkyon gyi rtsa ba re dogs gnyis yin pas/ /re dogs rtsa pa mchod cing/ /gnas sa gsum du ma phye na/ /ston pa byed pa tha ma
123a5(mdo 'grel): la shes pas slu ba yin/ /gnas gsum gyi mtshan nyid rtogs shing go gyur na/ /kun tu bzang pos bshad kyang de las lhag tu med/ /khri srong lde btsan byang chub sems dpa' i sras/ /khyod la bstan da mi dgos te/ /
123a6(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi gdams ngag 'di yi sgor zhugs la/ /blo chung shes rab rtul ba la/ /phra rags don gyis zhib par ston/ /gang zag cig gis zhing khams dag par mthong gyur na/ /'dus byas dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos char mi
123a7(mdo 'grel): phod?/ /zhe 'dod khong du bcug nas dad pa can gyi sems bsad na/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bsad pas sdig gi char mi phod/ /de nas dad pa can la snying rjes bstan par bya'o/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i
123b1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //yang mda' bdag chen pos zhus pa/ kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /sgyu ma'i lus 'di zhig pa'i tshe/ /theg pa kun las 'phags pa'i rtsod
123b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'khor lo 'di/ /gang la gtad cing su la nyer bar bya zhes zhus so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig/ theg pa kun las rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di/ /dad pa chung la zhe sdang che ba'i lag tu sho
123b3(mdo 'grel): ra re/ /rang gi 'dod pa ma 'phrel bar du kung sti byed cing zhe sa mkhas/ /'dod pa phrel nas thabs kyis 'byol ba'i lag tu shor re/ /bla ma slob dpon khungs gsangs nas/ /rang gi che ba 'dod cig nga rgyal che ba'i lag tu sho ra re//
123b4(mdo 'grel): khyel med zas tshol byed cing man ngag 'tshang ba'i lag tu sho ra re/ /zhe 'dod khog tu bcug nas 'dod pa che ba'i lag tu sho ra re/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i gtad sa bstan pa ni/ /zheng 'dod chung la dang pa che ba dang/ /
123b5(mdo 'grel): slob dpon snying ltar brtse? ba rnams la gtad/ /slob dpon mig ltar 'tsho ba rnams la gtad/ /slob dpon chu ltar skyong ba rnams la gtad/ /lus dang srog la phangs pa med cing gtong phod che ba rnams la gtad/ /rin po
123b6(mdo 'grel): che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo'i gtad rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/ //mnga' bdag chen pos zhus pa/ kye slob dpon chen po lags/ /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /bkra shis smon
123b7(mdo 'grel): lam gdab cing byin rlabs chen po zhu zhes so/ /slob dpon chen pos bka' stsal pa/ /mnga' bdag chen po nyon cig/ rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /theg pa 'di yi sgo ru zhugs pa rnams/ /ye shes chen po'i
124a1(mdo 'grel): don dang mjal bar shog /rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas 'dod pa'i khams kyi/ /ltung ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar shog/ rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /'gro ba mi yi zhe sdang
124a2(mdo 'grel): zhi bar shog/ rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /ngan song gsum gyis sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /skad cig tsam gyis brlag cing zhi ba shog /rin chen rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ khri srong lde btsan yab
124a3(mdo 'grel): sras 'khor bcas rnams/ /tshe la bar chad med cing don dang mjal bar shog/ rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo 'di bris pas/ /'bri mkhan slob ma'i tshogs rnams kun/ /tshe la bar chad med cing don dang mjal bar shog /
124a4(mdo 'grel): rin po che rtsod pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // */ /gces pa bsdus pa'i phrin yig btsun pa chen po dpal dbyangs kyis bod rje 'bangs la rdzangs pa bzhugs so// //gces pa bsdus pa'i 'phrin yig
124a5(mdo 'grel): btsun pa chen po dpal dbyangs kyis bod rdze 'bangs la rdzangs pa/ /bdag rtog skyon gyi phung po bshig/ legs pa'i yon tan mthar phyin pa/ /'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ded dpon gtso/ /ma lus mkhyen la bdag phyag
124a6(mdo 'grel): 'tshal/ /rgyal po rnams dang dge slong dang/ /blon po las kyi sna la gtogs/ /so so'i ded dpon dbang byed dang/ /zhing pa tshong pa zho shas 'tsho/ /mi yi skye ba blangs pa yi/ /ngal 'byor rnyed dang ma rnyed dang/ /bud med
124a7(mdo 'grel): rol mo mkhan rnams dang/ /dpung mdza' i bong ni rje 'bangs la/ /'di dang phyi mar phan pa'i phyir/ /dge ba bcu dang bcu drug dang/ /bsam pa bcu dang chos spyod bcu/ /pha rol phyin drug spyad pa yis/ /tshe rabs mang po
124b1(mdo 'grel): bgrangs par yang/ /legs pa'i gzhung gzugs bde 'gro dang/ /mthar ni sangs rgyas sgrub pa'i phyir/ /zhal nas gsungs pa'i mdo sde dang/ /dge bshes pa rnams rnyed par mdzad/ /klu sgrub snying po blo gros dang/ /ma la byams pas
124b2(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa yis/ /byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa dang/ /bshes shing mdza' ba'i phrin yig dang/ /rin chen phreng ba la sogs pa'i/ /nang nas phan pa'i gdams ngag dang/ /mang zhing zab mo'i don rnams ni/ /rgyas par bshad na mi rtogs
124b3(mdo 'grel): pas/ /de las sgrub sla gzung bde rnams/ /nyung zad tsam zhig bdag gis bsdebs/ /dul ba'i dpal ni bskyed nas kyang/ /bdud rtsi 'thung ba bzhin du nyon/ /dge bcu rmang du bya ba yi/ /mdo sde las ni 'di skad 'byung/ /lus kyi spyod
124b4(mdo 'grel): pa rab bsdams nas/ /srog gcod rku dang g.yem mi bya/ /phra ma rdzun dang tshig rtsub dang/ /'khyal pa smra bar mi bya'o/ /'dod pa rnams la mi chags shing/ /zhe sdang sems kyang med par bya/ /log par lta ba kun spangs nas/ /
124b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa yin/ /zhes 'byung/ /mi dge ba bcu spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa cir 'gyur zhe na/ /rin po che phreng ba las/ gsod pa yis ni tshe thung zhing/ /dmyal ba'i gnas su yun ring 'gyur/ /rnam par 'tshe bas
124b6(mdo 'grel): gnod pa mang/ /tshe rabs kun tu sdug bsngal 'gyur/ /rku ba yis ni longs spyod nyams/ /tshe rabs kun tu yi dags skye/ /byi bo byed pas dgra dang bcas/ /chung ma snying ni ring bar 'gyur/ /rdzun tu smra pas bkur ba
124b7(mdo 'grel): mang/ /tshig ni nam duAng mi btsun 'gyur/ /phra ma yis ni bshes dang 'bral/ /bdag la slu ba byed pa mang/ /tshig rtsub kyis ni mi snyan thos/ /mang po'ang dan pa smra par 'gyur/ /'khyal pa yis ni don mi rnyed/ /bdag
125a1(mdo 'grel): la'ang 'khyal ba byed par 'gyur/ /brnab sems yid kyi re ba 'joms/ /gnod sems 'jigs pa sbyin par byed/ /log par lta bas lta ngan nyid/ /tshang gi 'jig rten myos 'gyur te/ /nor shong
125a2(mdo 'grel): don rnams yal ba dang/ /bya ba ma yin thams cad byed/ /des na chad ni tshor zin bya/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /mi chos bcu drug ni/ /dkon mchog gsum la gcig tu dang/ /dge sbyong 'dzin cing bram zer 'dzin/ /trang zhing tra
125a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i rang bzhin can/ /byas gzo byas la phan 'dogs dang/ /pha dang mar ni 'dzin pa dang/ /rigs kyi rgan rims gung bar byed/ /tshes grangs rgyud la mkhas pa dang/ /dus tshig gso sbyong byed pa dang/ /bre srang 'jal lugs/
125a4(mdo 'grel): g.yo sgyu med/ /phan tshun 'gran sems gnod mi byed/ /'di ched phyi ma bsnyams nas spyod/ /dge bcu'i steng du 'di bsnan te/ /tshul bzhin bsrungs na lha mi yi/ /lus thob don yod chud mi za/ /de phyir thub pa chen po
125a5(mdo 'grel): yis/ /'jig rten pa yi yang dag lta/ /chen po su la yod gyur pa/ /de ni tshe rabs stong dag tu/ /ngan 'gror ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /zhes 'byung/ /rtag tu bsams pa bcu ni/ /nges par 'chi bsam las kyi bsags pa
125a6(mdo 'grel): bgrang/ /dkon mchog gsum bsten ngo bo nyid med mod/ /byang chub sems bstan theg chen zhugs la byams/ /rtag bsam don chen dpal gyi phreng bas bsngags/ /shes mdo sde dpal phreng las 'byung ste/
125a7(mdo 'grel): lhag tu bsam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan na yon tan ci 'thob ce na/ /yang mdo dag las/ dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di sgongs pas/ /dug gsum skye ba'i ljon btsan sa bcad/ /nyon mongs bung shing
125b1(mdo 'grel): skam po tshang tshing la/ /ye shes me stag rang rig gsal 'bar ba/ /blo las gyur nas thal ba bzhin du bsregs/ /bdud bzhi'i dmag dpung g.yul bzlog bkan phug nas/ /bdud kyi nas khang kun gzhi gtan nas blangs/ /de dag phyin
125b2(mdo 'grel): chang nga ni rgyal ba mngon byung ste/ /lha mi kun gyi bde stong dpal gyi sdong po dang/ /rtag tu bsam par bya ba bsams pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes ni mtshan gsol to/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /chos spyod rnam pa bcu ni/ /mgon po
125b3(mdo 'grel): byams pas dbus mdza' las/ /yi ge 'bri mchod sbyin pa dang/ /nyan dang 'dzin dang klog pa dang/ /'chang dang kha don byed pa dang/ /de sems pa dang de sgom pa'o/ /'di bcu chos kyis sgo mo ste/ /'dren pa rnams kyi gshegs shul yin
125b4(mdo 'grel): rig pa'i gnas lnga kun mkhyen pas/ /thams cad mkhyen par mtshan gsol to/ /de phyir rigs ldan skyes bus kyang/ /gnyid dang snyoms las le lo dang/ /'du 'dzi chags phyir khyim la dga' / /bre mo gtam dang bsrung ldebs dang/ /rgyan
125b5(mdo 'grel): po 'gyed dang 'dus la blta/ /sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pa dang/ /chang dang mtshan mo 'gro ba dang/ /longs spyod snyam pa'i 'du shes spang/ /ding bya sang bya ma sems par/ /bang bya brtod de ma 'bad na/ /'chi bdag bdud ni drung ni bya ra
125b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni/ /sbyin pa dang ni tshul khrims dang/ /bzod pa dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang/ /shes rab thabs la sogs pa rnams/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i gru/ /zhes 'byung/ pha rol tu phyin pa
125b7(mdo 'grel): drug po 'di dag ma skyed na sgo gzhan nas thabs med dam zhe na/ /mdo las/ yun rings mgron po'i rgyags su sbyin pa sme/ /lus sems rgyan dang chas su tshul khrims brjod/ /nyon mongs dgra tshogs 'joms par bzod pa dpa' //
126a1(mdo 'grel): 'phags lam bde bgrod bzhon par brtson 'grus bzang/ /yang dag don chen rtogs par bsam gtan myur/ /ma rig mun pa bsal ba shes rab gsal/ /zhes pa dang/ rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang/ /
126a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pas longs spyod khrims kyis bde/ /bzod pas mdangs ldan dge bas brjod/ /bsam gtan gyis ni blo gros 'phel/ /snying rtse bas ni don kun 'grub/ /bdun po 'di dag ma lus par/ /cig car pha rol phyin spyad pas/ /
126a3(mdo 'grel): sa thob ma gyur bar du yang/ /'khor ba'i bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /ngan song ming yang mi grag cing/ /mi khom brgyad po gtan du spangs/ /de nas rim par sa thob nas/ /'jig rten mgon po nyid thob 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung ngo/ /de ni de ltar
126a4(mdo 'grel): dge ba bcu dang/ /mi chos bcu drug dang/ /rtag tu bsam pa bcu dang/ /chos spyod rnam pa bcu dang/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa nyams su blangs nas spyad dgos pa mdo tsam bstan nas da ni chos 'di dag tu tshig tsam du bzlas
126a5(mdo 'grel): pas mi phan par bstan te/ /de yang byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i nang nas/ /sman pa'i ngag ma mnyan na sman dag gis/ /bcos dgos nad pa sos par ga la 'gyur/ /sman dpyad bklag pa tsam gyis ni/ /nad pa la
126a6(mdo 'grel): ni de phan nam/ /zhes 'byung ste/ rgyal po chen po gdams ngag gsol ba la yang rgyal po ka ni ka la gsol ba'i phrin yig las gdams bgyi mang por mchis mod kyang/ /thams cad gdams par sus rdo thog /mdo tsam du ni
126a7(mdo 'grel): gdams bgyi na/ /de ltar snyan gtong nyid kyi phyed/ /bdag gis gsol ba 'di gson te/ /sgrub dang gtang ba'i phyogs gnyis las/ /gang rigs de ni nyams su bzhes/ /gtang bar bgyi ba gtan ma mdzad/ /sa bdag tsher ma'i shing
126b1(mdo 'grel): las sbrang rtsi ltar/ /dgra bo las kyang legs par smras pa gzung/ /gser gyi ri la dug rgyun ji bzhin du/ /yid 'ong skye bo'i tshig ngan spang 'tshal te/ /mdo tsam gsol ba 'di dag nyams su bzhes/ /rgyal srid pha rol 'jig rten nas/ /?
126b2(mdo 'grel): bsnams te ma byon bsnams mi 'gyur/ /bsod nams rgyun las bsgrubs pa ste/ /de yang yud tsam gcig tu bas/ /g.yung drug btsugs par ma dgongs shing/ /gus dang zhes sar bcas pa yis/ /dam pa'i chos ni gsan par mdzod//
126b3(mdo 'grel): gsan pa'i chos rnams rnam dpyad de/ /spyad ba la ni mkhas par mdzod/ /mya ngan gyis rnam ma gdungs shing/ /na gzhon nad med longs pa yi/ /dngos po da ltar byung ba yi/ /blo gros la ni mi nus med/ /longs spyod srid la ma yengs par/ /
126b4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa rnams las dus su gson/ /'on tab? rim gyis mkhyen par 'gyur/ /nyung nguAng brtsags na nges par ni/ /ring por mi thogs mang por 'byung/ /rtag tu chu thigs re re'i rgyun/ /bar chad med par bab pa yis/ /gang zhig gang
126b5(mdo 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /snod de ji lta bu zhig mchis/ /ji ltar dpe gsal de lta bu/ /rgyal pos tshad mar mdzad nas ni/ /dam pa'i chos ni gsan pa la/ /rtag bar dgyes pa nyid du mdzad/ /zham ring blon po'i bu tshugs ni/ /yon tan
126b6(mdo 'grel): nor gyis gnyer la gnyen/ /mkhas shing snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /byams zo phongs chos mi bgyid pa/ /bzang po khyod kyi slad du zhog /mi gang dka' ba spyod byed dang/ /dor ba bya dka' 'dor ba dang/ /bzod par dka' ba bzod byed dang//
126b7(mdo 'grel): bkur dga' nyams su lon pa dang/ /ring por blta zhing nges pa dang/ /'phral blo myur zhing sdug pa dang/ /bod sran che zhing dpa' ba dang/ /bslu bar mi tshugs gsang thub dang/ /chos kyi rgyal srid skyong dga' dang/ /dam chos mdzad
127a1(mdo 'grel): la mi 'khor ba/ /rin gyis 'jal yang mi pham gyis thugs brtan mdzod la spyan mngar zhog/ khyod kyis slun dang phongs chos ce na/ /gzhung ngan gdong gang byed pa dang/ /brkam zhing byas pa mi gzongs/ /
127a2(mdo 'grel): kha gcam gtum po mi bzang pa/ /yul na'ang gnas su ma rtsal cig /gal te gzhung lugs bzang dgos na/ /gong nas gong du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /gal te ngan pa spyod mdzad na/ /'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur/ /khyu mchog
127a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni khyus 'gro bzhin/ /khyod ni gya gyu la zhugs na/ /gya gyu kho na'i rjes 'brongs te/ /skye dgu khyod kyi rje 'brangs pas/ /rgyal khams ngan bar 'ongs 'gyur ro/ /zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin du/ /nyes pa'i tshogs rnams 'grib par
127a4(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du/ /rgyal khams legs par rgyas par mdzod/ /dam chos bskyang ba'i khrims rnams mdzod/ /dom chos 'jig pa'i skye bo dang/ /bka' khrims 'dral ba'i ngan pa rnams/ /lo tog rtsi tog
127a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa la/ /thog dang ser ba bzhin du phob/ /'o na dang ngan mig 'gag par 'gyur/ /le lo nyam bu shed ma mdzad/ /'chi bdag su dang mi shes pa/ /blo bur dag tu 'bab 'gyur bas/ /sang ngag bya zhes ma gzhes par/ /dam
127a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos la skur te mdzod/ /'chi bdag gis ni drangs pa na/ /dge dang sdig pa ma rtogs pa/ /'gro ba thams cad phyir log nas/ /'ga' yang khyod ni mi 'brang bas/ /mkhyen par mdzod la legs par spyod/ /slob dpon chen po
127a7(mdo 'grel): klu sgrub kyis/ /rgyal po bde spyod bzang po la brdzangs pa'i 'phrin yig las kyang/ /longs spyod g.yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas/ /dge slong bram ze bkren dang ba shes rnams la/ /sbyin pa tshul bzhin brtsal bgyi pha rol tu/ /
127b1(mdo 'grel): sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so/ /khyod kyis dge slong bram ze lha dang ni/ /'gron dang yab yum sras dang btsun mo dang/ /'khor gyi slad du sdig pa mi bgyi ste/ /dmyal ba'i rnam smin skal nod 'ga' ma mchis/ /
127b2(mdo 'grel): sdig pa'i las rnams spyad pa 'ga' yang ni/ /mtshon bzhin 'phral du lus la mi spyod kyang/ /gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs de na sdod/ /thar pa dag la rag lus 'di la ni/ /gzhan gyis gros bgyir cir yang ma mchis kyis/ /bde ltar
127b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi rtsal gyis 'bad par mdzod/ /tshe mi gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yis/ /chu yi tshu bur bas kyang mi rtag ste/ /dbugs rdub dbugs phyung gnyid kyis log pa las sad khom gang lags de dag ngo mtshar che/ /lus mdza' 
127b4(mdo 'grel): thar ba mthar skam mthar 'drul zhing/ /tha mar mi gtsang snying po ma mchis pa/ /rnam par 'jigs dengs myags par 'gyur ba de/ /so sor gyes chos can du rig par mdzod/ /rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bu ga dang/ /rus sbal
127b5(mdo 'grel): phrang ? pas kyang dung 'gro las/ /mi nyid ches 'thob dka' bas mi dbang gis/ /dam chos sbyar pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod/ /gang zhig gser snod rin chen spras pa yis/ /snod du ngan skyugs? phyag dar bgyis pa bas/ /gang zhig
127b6(mdo 'grel): mi ru skyes nas sdig pa dag /bgyis pa de ni ches rab blun pa lags/ /sras dang btsun mo yab yum 'khor rnams kyang/ /des pa ma mchis las kyi rlung dmar gyis/ /gangs pa tsam ste bdag tu bzung ba bas/ /pha ni bu nyid ma
127b7(mdo 'grel): ni chung ma nyid/ /skye bo dgrar gyur pa yang bshes nyid dang/ /bzlog pa nyid du mchis pas de slad du/ /'khor ba dag na nges pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /thugs brtan ma mdzad 'di kun bslu ba'i bdud/ /bsnyengs dang bral ba mngon du/ /sol
128a1(mdo 'grel): ci 'tshal/ /phan pa'i gdams ngag dam pa 'di lags te/ /khyod kyis thugs dul mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis/ /sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba lags bar gsungs/ /rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang/ /dam
128a2(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos dang chos smra la nyid kyis bkur sti mchog dang ni/ /gus par mdzod de gdan las bzhengs/ /me tog gtor nas chos mnyan cing/ /chos kyi sbyin pa dag kyang mdzod/ /'jig rten gtam la dga' ma mdzod//
128a3(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten 'das la dgyes par mdzod/ /'khor rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/ /lhun sdug brtan dang nges bar mdzad/ /bka' lung mi 'gyur nges par gsungs/ /snyan khung mi yang sdug pa dang/ /bud med chags phyir
128a4(mdo 'grel): 'char g.yeng dang/ /srab chos bus pa ltar ma mdzad/ /cung zad tsam gyis khro ma mdzod/ /ji ltar rgyal srid bskyang ba dang/ /'bangs kun bde la dgod pa dang/ /bsngo ba'i dgra rnams gdul ba dang/ /rgyal khams chos kyis
128a5(mdo 'grel): bskyang bgyi ba/ /zhib tu dgongs nas grub par mdzod/ /'grub bam mi 'grub ma nges par/ /dgongs ma thag tu ma gsungs shig /yun gyi srid cing chos sgrub cing/ /ser sna 'jur 'gegs ma mdzad par/ /bdog
128a6(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad gtugs te mdzod/ /khyod ni bdog pa kun bor nas/ /gcig pu gshed gshegs 'tshal ba/ /chos kyi slad du spyad pa kun/ /khyod kyi mdun du 'ong ba nyid/ /'bangs la re ba ma 'jog par/ /zhal bzhugs
128a7(mdo 'grel): tshe na myur bar mdzod/ /gtsug lag khang dag brtsig pa dang/ /mchod rten brtsig dang na bza' gsol/ /zhig ral bcos dang mchod pa gzugs/ /lha khang la sogs gzhan bgyi ba/ /snga lugs bzhin du rgyas ?
128b1(mdo 'grel): mdzod/ /dam chos tshul bzhin spyod pa yis/ /dge slong dge bsnyen la sogs pa/ /gzhan gyis brtse ba med pa yi/ /dpun gnyen skyabs dang kha 'dzin mdzod/ /'di kun yun du bde ba yi/ /myang ngan 'da' ba' i dge tshogs lags//
128b2(mdo 'grel): bgres khar dgon par gshegs nas ni/ /mi ru 'khrungs pa'i don yod mdzod/ /blon po rnams dang las kyi sna/ /mnga' ris dbus mdza' i 'bangs rnams ni/ /dran pa can gyis sgrub byas pa/ /rnam pa mang po yod na yang/ /sngon gyis
128b3(mdo 'grel): drang srong mkhas rnams kyis/ /gdams ngag mdo tsam 'dir bstan gyis/ /bdud rtsi 'thung ba bzhin du slob/ /gting nas khros shing 'khrugs gyur kyang/ /mdog mdangs ldan zhing 'dzum par smra/ /'khon gcugs che zhing sha
128b4(mdo 'grel): chags kyang/ /phran tshegs khro gtum gnod mi byed/ /dgra bo 'thab zlar gyur kyang 'phral tshul ci dgar 'drid/ /pha rol tshig ngan rdzogs kyang ngan du lan mi smra/ /bdag gi rgyab tu lta zhing lam sel thub thabs srang bsrubs tshol/ /gnyen
128b5(mdo 'grel): spyad ran par tshol zhing so nam zhib mor sgrub/ /phaT ral rtsing dang gtum chos nga rgyal chung/ /rnam smin med pa'i so nam yal bar bor nas ni/ /gzhan gyi nor la rtsi gdab chom rkun gzan btsal yang/ /pha ma'i nor dang drin chen
128b6(mdo 'grel): dga' mdza' i nor/ /dkon mchog dkor dang lha klus dbang byas nor/ /nam duAng mi spyad phongs chos khrel dor spang/ /byi'o cog la yid ring sran dang ldan/ /rna khung ran par che zhing phra ma'i kha na lci/ /drin can pha khu ma dang gnyen
128b7(mdo 'grel): bshes la/ /gsong rer bkur sti rim gro bran ltar byed/ /byed dgu ran la tshon zin brtan par gzhung la mkhas/ /dgos ba'i don la ma lhas le lo med/ /gya tshom mi smra shes kyang ma bcol rang zhugs yod mi byed/ /zin ?
129a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'dor 'og nas sngar mi smra/ /lhag par khe mthong btsal glags yod kyang mi rigs 'dod chen yod mi byed/ /dbang dang tshan gyis thub kyang 'phyas bsnon gzan mi tshol/ /nye zhes nye mgon mi byed ring
129a2(mdo 'grel): zhes stams las yod mi gcod/ /dbang sar phyin cing kun gyis bkur yang mdza' dag sems bsrungs bya/ /legs nyes bsam zhing srod dang tho rangs dge ba spyad/ /nga rgyal khengs sems mu chor smra dang rgyags
129a3(mdo 'grel): chos med/ /tshan kar mi 'dod gzhan gyis brtsis ra yun rings bstod/ /phyi tshul mi 'chos nang gi g.yo sgyu med/ /gsod des mnyen dang gsal sdug 'jam la ring/ /ngan la khyad du mi gsod zhes phangs med mnyam na phrag dog
129a4(mdo 'grel): 'gran sems nor ngan gzhan la 'cha' mi byed/ /bdag la rang stong mi byed gzhan la ma tshang mi 'bru/ /dpa' la sran che byed dgu 'dzangs la slob/ /chang dang bud med dang dang khe skam gcam bu'i las/ /nam duAng mi byed chud
129a5(mdo 'grel): ma ngan pa'i khar mi gtong/ /yod ni 'phya la mi mkhas shing/ /byed du bcug na nor par rtsom/ /zhib tu dpyad de las rnams brtsam/ /mang po rnams ni kha bsdus la/ /ngan pa'ang khyad du mi gsod par/ /gros su byas dang 'gyod
129a6(mdo 'grel): ba med/ /'dzangs pa rnams ni las su bsko/ /yul du gsar khung byung ba yin/ /dpa' bo rnams kyis 'thab sna drang/ /drang rgan rnams kyis 'dun sar gzung/ /drang po rnams kyis zhal che gcad/ /g.yog rnams 'khor
129a7(mdo 'grel): gyis mel tse bsgrim/ /nyes na chad par na par gcad/ /tshes na bus kyang mi bzod 'gyur/ /thog tu bab pa'i las rnams bya/ /'on tang kun gyis bsngags par 'gyur/ /legs pa'i ro 'phral sbyin pa yang/ /thog tu bab
129b1(mdo 'grel): dang phrag dog med/ /nyes pa'i skyon yang mi 'phel lo/ /nyes pa ma legs byung na yang/ /mi ni bting nas mi ma gcad?/ /phyi nas chu gang dran par 'gyur/ /phyug ni dus cig sun mi dbyung/ /'on dang lcags skyed tshe bar 'gyur/ /bran ni bkol
129b2(mdo 'grel): zhing rigs bkol dang/ /yun du snying ni nye bar 'gyur/ /bu tsha mkhas par bslab pa ni/ /gtan gyi srid du phyi phyir tshe/ /skyes pa 'dzangs par gyur pa ni/ /nor du mkhas dang gtam snyan sgrub/ /dur med 'dzangs par gyur pa ni/ /khyo la
129b3(mdo 'grel): sri zhu rim 'gro dang/ /rigs pas bsgrubs pa'i bdog don dang/ /mi smra rna gung che ba dang/ /dgos pa'i 'gron la yangs pa dang/ /skyes bu gzhan du mi tshol dang/ /bya ba rnams la ma rmongs nas/ /lkugs pa bzhin du 'dug kyang
129b4(mdo 'grel): bla/ /zhes pa la sogs pa sngon gyi drang srong gis gdams ngag mdo tsam bstan pa yang tshe 'di'i ched dang/ /tshe phyi ma'i ched kyang gong du bstan pa bzhin byas la dang drang na yun gyi srid chen po yang zhar la yod de/ /rgyal pos drang por
129b5(mdo 'grel): byas dang rgyal srid mi nyams che/ /blon pos drang por byas dang che ba tsan yun du brtag de'i gzhi las thar pa thob par 'gyur/ /zhes 'byung/ /gzhan dag las kyang/ /rtsod pa med par chos smra ba ni mkhas pa'i rab/ /ji ltar ngan par
129b6(mdo 'grel): gleng bar gyur yang ma 'khrugs pa ni bdud kyi yul las 'das pa/ /rgyal po'i phrin las bya ba ni/ /gtso cher 'bangs kyi spu 'dam/ /blon po'i las su bya ba ni/ /drang bsnyam mi ni thabs kyis bcos/ /phyug ni mig gis bcol
129b7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ /nor ni dgos pa'i don du sbyar/ /mo ni sman dang yul mi 'tshor/ /skyid pa'i mdza' ni ring por 'gyur/ /dal? gyis 'bab pa'i chu bo ni/ /yun du gzhung ni btsan par 'gyur/ /sprin ni hal hol can dag gis/ /zhing par? dga' 
130a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i char mi phebs/ /mi ni khra khro can dag gis/ /dgos pa'i don ni shor bar 'gyur/ /dal bus song bas gang duAng phyin/ /'jam par smras pas su yang go /bsrings nas bsgrubs bas ci yang 'grub/ /
130a2(mdo 'grel): blon po rnams kyis bya ba'i mdo/ /khrims su bcas pa brtan por gzung/ /bka' lung btsan zhing snyan par bsgrub/ /sgo chod yal bar bor nas ni/ /gtso cher spyi cher srog dang bsngos/ /mna' ni gzan du mi bor zhing/ /'tham pa thams
130a3(mdo 'grel): cad brtsan par bya/ /dam chos bsrung la brtson pa dang/ /gtso cher yun gyi srid du ni/ /dam chos spyod pa mchog yin no/ /zhes 'byung/ /blon po cig pur ma zad kyi/ /mi yis ris su skyes pa yi/  /glon lkugs 'on la ma gtogs pa/ /
130a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad kun gyis de bzhin spyad/ /'on tang 'di dang phyi mar yang/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ /de dag gdams ngag dam pa yin/ /da ni rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dang/ /dge tshul dang/ dge slong ma la gdam ngag bya ba/ /
130a5(mdo 'grel): dang por rab tu ji ltar byung/ /sems thag gcad nas skra breg shing/ /ston pa'i na bza' ngur smrig bgos/ /pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes la'ang/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul byas pas/ /kun gyi mchod gnas yin pas na/ /'jig rten pa yis
130a6(mdo 'grel): ma 'phyas par/ /bslab pa 'di ltar rim bzhin bya/ /ston pa rkang gnyis gtso bo dang/ /'dod chags bral ba chos kyi gtso/ /'dus pa'i gtso ste dge 'dun la/ /gus par skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/ /slob dpon mkhan po khrims dbang
130a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ /'phrin las mdzad pa'i dge 'dun la/ /gus par zhus te dge bsnyen dang/ /dge tshul dge slong par slob dang/ /dge slong ma yi sdom pa dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' i bslab pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du mnos nas kyang/ /
130b1(mdo 'grel): nyes byas med par bsrung bar bya'o/ /maN+Dal chag chag phyag dar dang/ /zhu gnas gca' dang lhung bzed bkru/ bla ma dge 'dun bgros pa yi/ /dgos pa'i yan lag thams cad bya/ /srod dang tho rangs thun gnyis la/ /mi nyal kha ton dge ba bya/ /
130b2(mdo 'grel): 'bri klog nyan 'dzin bsam pa dang/ /sgom dang bden pa bzhi la bsam/ /de nas rim gyis brtson ldan par/ /bla ma mgu bar byas nas ni/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lugs/ /'dul ba mdo sde'i mngon pa'i
130b3(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /theg pa kun las 'jal bar bslab/ /kun gyi phul du phyin bya'i phyir/ /rigs pa'i gnas lnga dag dang ni/ /rigs pa'i gnas ni bco brgyad la/ /thogs pa med par bslab par bya'o/ /bkur sti'i gnas su gyur nas kyang/ /nga rgyal khengs
130b4(mdo 'grel): sems phrag dog spang/ /rang mthong sger bu'i las mi bya/ /kha nas smra ba'i tshig rnams dang/ /don duAng mthun par chos bzhin spyod/ /nga mkhas gzhan ni mi shes zhes/ /kun la 'phya ba'i las mi brtsam/ /slob par 'dod pa'i gang zag
130b5(mdo 'grel): rnams/ /ci la dga' bar bshad par bya'o/ /sngon gyi slob dpon drin che la/ /bkur sti rim gro bran bzhin bya'o/ /gtsor na snying rje brtser ldan zhing/ /tshad med bzhi yi go cha bgos/ /dus ngan tha mar skyes pa yis/ /da lta'i dge slong rang mthong
130b6(mdo 'grel): can/ /cung zad yon tan rnyed pa dang/ /khengs shing rang mthong gyod bu byed/ /mar gyis ko khengs bskus mnyes na/ /mi dul ba ni cig kyang med/ /de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis kyang/ /mi she ko khengs 'dra ba 'dul/ /drod skogs mar dang
130b7(mdo 'grel): lhan cig kyang/ /mnye btul ma byas gyod bur 'dug /de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis bskus/ /shes bzhin dran pas ma mnyes na/ /chos mar bskus kyang gong bur 'dug /mnyes pa bzhin du dul bar gyis bslab pas mi ngoms nyam par byos/ /mkhas pa rnams la dri ba byos/
131a1(mdo 'grel): che 'chos la ni shor dogs par/ /thos pa mang po ma yin yang/ /'ga' tsam goms la'ang mnyan par byos/ /grogs po rnams la 'gran sems bor/ /rgan pa rnams ni rim par khur/ /gzhan pa
131a2(mdo 'grel): 'phya ba mi dgos kyis/ /rang nyid de ltar ma byed cig /chos kyi spun dang bral nas ni/ /mi chos mnyen la mnyes ma byed/ /sems can ngan mig ma bskyed cig /khyod kyis bya ba'i las min pa/ /chung ma blang dang bu tshang glag /
131a3(mdo 'grel): 'khrug pa bya dang khe tshong bya/ /bre zol bya dang srang zol bya/ /sgyu ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ /'phyar dang rta gang tsab h+ral dang/ /chos gos med par grong rgyu dang/ /gzhan gyi chung ma bsten pa dang/ /srog chags gsar dang rdzun
131a4(mdo 'grel): smra dang/ /chom rkun bya yi pho nya dang/ /phra ma mi g.yes la sogs pa/ /'chi bar bsams nas mi bya'o/ /bcom ldan shAkyas bka' stsal pa/ /nga yi bstan pa'i dam chos ni/ /mu stegs can gyis mi gshigs
131a5(mdo 'grel): te/ /seng ge'i khog pa ji bzhin du/ /nga yi slob mas gshigs par 'gyur/ /nga yi bstan pa dam chos ni/ /nan tan snying por byed pa yi/ /gang zag dge slong lag na gnas/ /bka' bzhin byed pa'i dge slong ni/
131a6(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa med par ngas bshad do/ /dam pa'i chos 'jig ngan sna 'dren/ /ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las/ /nams kyang thar pa ngas ma gsungs/ /bdud kyi slu bas zin pa la/ /thar pa'i glags ni med
131a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur gyis/ /dang po'i dam bcas ji bzhin du/ /chos kyi klung du 'gro bar byos/ /bu smad 'dod pa'i sred ba dang/ /nams kyang gnas par ma byed cig /gal te bus smad 'dod ces te/ /khyim pa'i dngos po byed ce na
131b1(mdo 'grel): dang po khyod ni su yis bslus/ /dkon mchog gsum bslu ci'i phyir/ /slob dpon mkhan po ci la dgos/ skye ba'i mchod gnas ci phyir bya/ /'dreg pa'i bye brag gsum yod de/ /sog po rnams ni gtsos kyis 'dreg /dud 'gro phal ni las
131b2(mdo 'grel): kyis 'dreg /dge 'dun rnams ni yon tan gyis/ 'dreg pa yin na gang phyir dregs/ /ston pa'i na bza' chud re zos/ /na bza' chos gos 'o re rgyal/ /dang po 'dod chags bral zhe na/ /ci'i phyir de ni bu smad la/ /mi shes skye bo 'bub bzhin//
131b3(mdo 'grel): khong nas gdung sems yod re che/ /'dod pa rnams la de bzhin 'dun/ /dang po'i dam bca' gang tsug song/ /de yis mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ram/ /sdug bsngal grong khyer 'jig 'gyur ram/ /ji ltar bshang gci gsher ba la/ /ngan
131b4(mdo 'grel): sgyags khyi phags chags pa ltar/ /de bzhin gshang gci gsher ba la/ /'dod ldan pa na de phag ltar chags/ /bdag lus bud med mi gtsang bar/ /da dung bar du ma rtogs par/ /mi rtag sgyu ma'i bu smad la/ /yang dang yang du chags
131b5(mdo 'grel): pa ni/ /mi gtsang don du khyim rnams bzhin/ /e ma'i gzu lums e ma'o blun/ /e ma'o skye bos khrel du rung/ /slob dpon mkhan po khrims dpa' rnams/ /khyung skor los kyang mthong mi byed/ /chung ma'i gnyen la dge bshes bzhin/
131b6(mdo 'grel): skyo ba tsam du 'khor bar byed/ /des ci 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /myur du rgal bar 'gyur zhe 'am/ /ga sha khu ljo ma byas sam/ /gleg bam thag pas khu ljo yi/ /dkri ba'i thag pa ma byas tsam/ /sku gzugs dar ma lha cha rnams/ /
131b7(mdo 'grel): byi brun zhig pa du bas non/ /g.yang ga gtsang mar bskyal na rung/ /gal te legs don ma yin yang/ /'bum la khyim par gyur yang ni/ /bde gshegs bslab pa dran byas nas/ /gnas khang so sor 'dug byas la/ /nyes pa? bshags?
132a1(mdo 'grel): shing dge ba spyad/ /bslab pa 'grus par brtson par bskyed/ /btsun pa rnams la bkur sti bya/ /rang skyon sba phyir mtshang mi bru/ /'on tang sdig zhang 'bril phan/ /sems la blta zhing don la sgom/ /tshul khrims
132a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par dag par 'gyur/ /dge slong ma yang ci'i phyir/ /dang po khas blangs dam bcas nas/ /sngar tshul bstan pa'i dge slong bzhin/ /legs par rab tu byung byas nas/ /rab bslus sdig pa'i khur bu drags/ /ston pa'i bka' 
132a3(mdo 'grel): ni khyad du bsad/ /khyim pa skye bo'i 'ogs na nyal/ /dang po skra ni 'breg pa'i tshe/ /khyim bdag snying du mi sdug gam/ /pha ma sdang ngam mgo rgyan med/ /khyim thabs mchis sam nyes skyon byung/ /ci'i phyir na tshul khrims dral/ /snying nas
132a4(mdo 'grel): dam chos spyod ce na/ /las 'phro ngan cing blo zhan pas/ /mkhas pa'i phul du mi 'grub kyis/ /sems thag chad la btsun par bsgrub/ /klog dang gdon la brtson 'grus bskyed/ /skyes pa rnams la mi lta zhing/ /rang gi gnas khang dag
132a5(mdo 'grel): tu 'dug /thos pa gsags na nam zha yi/ /chos kyi gter ni gzung bar 'gyur/ /bya byed dag la yong ma 'jug /de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin/ /da 'di man bcad ni/ /spyir dge ba spyad cing sdig pa spang bar gdams ngag byed/ /de yang
132a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i nang nas mdo tsam bstan pa dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed pa shin tu dka' / /skyes bus don grub thob par gyur pa la/ /gal te 'di la phan par ma sgrubs na/ /phyis 'di yang dag 'byor par ga
132a7(mdo 'grel): la 'gyur/ /bdag gi 'byor pa drug gzhan gyi 'byor pa bdun te bcu gsum mo/ /de la bdag gi 'byor pa drug la/ /yul gyi dbus su skyes pa dang/ /dbang po tshang ba dang/ /gnas la dad par gyur pa dang/ /smon lam dag pas sdig
132b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i grog po dang ma phrad pa dang/ /las kyi mdza' ma leg pa dang/ /lta ba ngan pas mi 'phrogs pa'o/ /gzhan gyi 'byor pa la/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ /dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ /bstan pa gnas pa dang/ /chos kyi rjes su 'jug
132b2(mdo 'grel): ba'i grogs po zang zing la mi lta ba dang phrad pa dang/ /theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i gnyen gzhan gyi don du/ /snying rje che ba dang phrad pa dang/ /chos byed pa la byams pa'i grong khyer nye bar skyes pa dang/ /rgyal po chos bzhin byed pa'i yul du skyes pa'o/
132b3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin rum nas/ /glog 'gyus skad cig par snang ston pa ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas mthus kyang brgya lam na/ /'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang ka 'byung/ /de ltar dge ba nyams chung nyid la rtag /sdig pa stobs
132b4(mdo 'grel): chen shin tu mi bzad pa/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa/ /dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod sems yod kyang/ /sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug /bde ba 'dod kyang gti mug
132b5(mdo 'grel): pas/ /rang gi bde ba dgra ltar 'joms/ /yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/ /byas dang ma byas mi bsdod pas/ /na dang mi na kun gyis kyang/ /glo bur tshe kha yid mi brtan/ /thams cad bor te cha bgos par/ /bdag gis de ltar ma shes
132b6(mdo 'grel): nas/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' i don gyi phyir/ /sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/ /mi mdza' rnams kyang med 'gyur zhing/ /mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur/ /bdag kyang med par 'gyur ba nyid/ /de bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur//
132b7(mdo 'grel): rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/ /re zhig gson tshe 'di nyid la/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' du ma 'das/ /de dag don du byas pa'i sdig /mi bzang gang yin mdun na gnas/ /de ltar bdag ni glo bur zhes/ /bdag gis rtogs par ma rgyur
133a1(mdo 'grel): pas/ /gti mug chags dang zhe sdang gis/ /sdig pa rnam pa du ma byas/ /nyin mtshan bsdod pa yod med par/ /tshe 'di rtag tu 'god 'gyur zhing/ /snon pa gung nas 'ong med na/ /bdag lta 'chi bar cis mi
133a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /bdag ni mal na 'dug bzhin du/ /gnyen bshes mang pos mdza' skor yang/ /srog gcod pa yi tshor ba dag /bdag nyid gcig pus myong bar 'gyur/ /shin rje'i pho nyas zin pa la/ /gnyen bas ci phan bshes ci
133a3(mdo 'grel): phan/ /de tshe bsod nams gcig skyabs na/ /de yang bdag gis ma bsten to/ /'jig pa 'di 'dra ma 'tshal nas/ /mi rtag tshe 'di'i ched dag tu/ /sdig pa mang pos nye bar sgrubs/ /de ltar 'jigs chen yod pas na/ /dge
133a4(mdo 'grel): bshes bsten la bsod nams byos/ /gnyen dang bshes rnams rnam spangs nas/ /gcig pu gshed 'gro dgos na/ /mdza' dang mi mdza' kun cir rung/ /mi dge ba las sdug bsngal 'byung/ /de las ji ltar nges bar zhes
133a5(mdo 'grel): nyin mtshan rtag tu bdag gis ni/ /de nyid rtag tu bsam par rigs/ /da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang/ /mi ru skyes pa'i don yod bya/ /long bas phyag dar phung po las/ /ji ltar rin chen rnyed pa ltar/ /de bzhin ji zhig ltar
133a6(mdo 'grel): stes nas/ /byang chub sems ni bdag la skyes/ /blo 'dir rab tu shug dbyung ngo/ /ding nas brtson pa ma byas na/ /'og nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas grangs med 'das  
133a7(mdo 'grel): gyur kyang/ /bdag ni rang gis nyes pa de'i/ /gso ba'i spyod yul ma gyur to/ /da dung de bzhin bdag byed na/ /ngan 'gro ngan dang 'chi ba dang/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba dang/
133b1(mdo 'grel): dang dang mi lus thob pa dang// dge goms rung ba de lta bur/ /dkon pa nam zhig thob bar 'gyur/ /nad med nyi ma 'di lta bur/ /zas bcas 'tshe ba med kyang ni/ /tshe ni skad cig bslu ba ste/ /lus ni thang cig brnyen po bzhin/ /bdag gi spyod
133b2(mdo 'grel): pa 'di 'dras ni/ /mi lus phyis ni thob mi 'gyur/ /mi lus thob par ma gyur na/ /sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med/ /gang tshe dge spyad skal ldan yang/ dge ba bdag gis ma byas na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal kun rmongs pa/ /de tshe bdag gis
133b3(mdo 'grel): ci byar yod/ /dge ba dag kyang ma byas la/ /sdig pa dag ni cher bsags na/ /bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/ /bde 'gro'i sgra yang thos mi 'gyur/ /don med dgra yis rma srol brtod pa yang/ /lus la rgyan dang 'dra bar srel byed na/ /don
133b4(mdo 'grel): chen sgrub phyir yang dag brtson gyur pa/ /bdag la sdug bsngal ci phyir gnod byed yin/ /nya pa zhing pa gdol ba la sogs pa/ /rang gi 'tsho ba tsam zhig sems dpa' yang/ /grang dang tsha la sogs pa gnod bzod na/ /yun gyi bde
133b5(mdo 'grel): phyir bdag lta ci zhig smos/ /de phyir sdig ni sems las byung bas na/ /bslab pa bsrung bas 'dod pa yis/ /rab tu sgrims te sems gdul te/ /sems 'di gdul ba ma byas na/ /bslab pa bsrung bar yong ma nus/ /sems kyi glang po
133b6(mdo 'grel): yan btang bas/ /mnar med gnod pa byed pa ltar/ /glang chen mdul myos pa yis/ /'di na de 'dra'i gnod mi byed/ /kun nas dran ba'i thag pa yis/ /sems kyi glang po dam btags na/ /'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur/ /dge
133b7(mdo 'grel): ba thams cad lag tu 'ong/ /sems 'di kho na thul ba yis/ /gnod byed thams cad 'dul bar gyur/ /sems can mi bstan nam mkha' bzhin/ /de dag gzhom gyis ga la lang/ /khro ba'i sems ni gcig bcom nas/ /dgra de thams
134a1(mdo 'grel): cad choms dang 'dra/ /sa steng 'di kun kos g.yog tu/ /de snyed ko ba ga la yod/ /rkang mthil gang gis ko bas ni/ /sa steng thams cad g.yogs dang 'dra/ /de phyir phyi rol dngos po yang/ /bdag gis
134a2(mdo 'grel): phyir bzlog mi lang gis/ /bdag gis sems 'di phyir bzlog bya'i/ /gzhan rnams bzlog go ci zhig dgos/ /gang gis chos kyi don po mchog /sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na/ /bde 'dong sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod
134a3(mdo 'grel): kyang/ /de dag don med gyi na 'khyam/ /de ltar bdag gi sems 'di ni/ /legs bzung legs par rtogs par bya/ /sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa/ /brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya/ /ma grangs grol ba'i
134a4(mdo 'grel): khrod nas ni/ /bsgrims te rma yi bag byed bzhin/ /skye bo ngan khrod gnas pas kyang/ /sems kyi rma ni rtag tu bzung/ /sems rma rtag tu bsrung ba yang/ /bla ma dang ni 'grogs pa las/ /mkhas pas rjes su brtan pa dang/ /'jigs
134a5(mdo 'grel): pas skal ldan gus byed la/ /dran pa shin tu skye bar 'gyur/ /de phyir dge bshes mkhas pa bsten/ /don med g.yeng bar lta ba ni/ /phan? des nam yang mi bya ste/ /skye bo 'jangs pa'i de bzhin spyod/ /gang zhig mig lam
134a6(mdo 'grel): 'ong na yang/ /bltas nas legs par mgu bar bya/ /dgos na thag ring dag tu 'ang lta/ /gang zhig bsam na byar rtsams pa/ /de las gzhan du mi bsam ste/ /der gtad pa yi bsam pa yis/ /de nyid kho na bsgrubs par
134a7(mdo 'grel): bya/ /de lta na ni kun 'grub 'gyur/ /gzhan du gnyis kar mi 'grub bo/ /khyi ni cung ? snyeg pa dang/ /lha khang bar gyi khyi bzhin du/ /dran drod thams cad mi bya'o/ /ring zhig lon nas dag ba'i mchog /rnyed pa yang dang yang
134b1(mdo 'grel): bsams nas/ /dge slong yin na 'khor g.yog dang/ /drung du 'ongs ba'i lha mi rnams/ /thams cad dge la bzung bar bya/ /khyim pa yin na'ang bu dag dang/ /chung ma pha ma gnyen 'dun rnams/ /gros btab thams cad dge la gzung/ /
134b2(mdo 'grel): 'on tang byang chub spyod pa rdzogs/ /bran g.yog kol du mi gtub pa/ /zas la sogs pa mi sbyin ltar/ /dge ba mi byed lus 'di la/ /bsnyod kyang de'u de gzhan 'gro la/ /sdig lus bsnyod cing gos bkon yang/ /phan med sdig byed
134b3(mdo 'grel): ji ste gso/ /khyod ma 'dras pas phung 'go btsugs/ /khyod 'dras pas na phung mgo bcugs/ /dkon mchog pham dga' mdza' dang/ /drin yod drin med rnams kyi nor/ /sgyus rkus mthus phrogs thabs kyis bslus/ /ma 'drang
134b4(mdo 'grel): ma yog sdig lus khyod/ /mjug tu 'bu sbrang nyod par song/ /khyod ma sos pas dmyal bar btang/ /bsad pa'i sdig pa khyod las byung/ /khyod ma mgu bas 'phrog rlom byas/ /yi dags gnas su khyod kyis btang/ /khyod ma sos
134b5(mdo 'grel): pas long chung ste/ /dge bshes ma bsten chos mnyan/ /des na dud 'gro blun por 'gyur/ /gtan du 'khyams pa khyod kyis nyes/ /khyod ni dge ba spyod gyur na/ /rin chen phung po phangs pa'i gtso/ /khyod la bsten nas sangs rgyas
134b6(mdo 'grel): chos/ /'bras bu bla med byang chub dang/ /par duAng bde 'gro skyid ba yis/ /long btags don yod byed pas na/ /'gro dang 'ong ba'i rten tsam du/ /lus la glu yi blo zhog ste/ /'di la gla rngan byin nas ni/ /da ni rang gi don
134b7(mdo 'grel): byed chug/ rmongs pa'i sems khyod ci zhig zer/ /gzugs su 'dzin pa khyod rang yin pa/ /lus su lta ba khyod rang yin/ /don med shes pa gzhan nas 'ongs/ /'byung bas bsgrubs pa'i khu khrag la/ /khyod kyis dar 'dzin?
135a1(mdo 'grel): byas nas ni/ /bu dang bu mor khyod kyis bzung/ /gzhan gyis 'byung ba'i khu khrag la/ /gzhan zhes dgra ru lta bar byed/ sdig pas bsgrubs pa'i zang zing la/ /gzhan gyis khyer snyam phrag dog lngas/ /don med
135a2(mdo 'grel): byis pa'i sprod pa 'dra/ /khyod kyis shes na de min pa'i/ /bzang po'i dpal ta re yod na/ /de las ma shes ci byar yod/ /nga yis nyes pa ci yang med/ /nyes pa thams cad khyod las byung/ /khyod kyi rtsa ya kun bcos na/ /gang du 'gro ba
135a3(mdo 'grel): kho bos lta/ /khyod kyi ngar 'dzin ma byas na/ /nga ni 'byung ba'i bag la zha/ /nga ma gso bas khyod bder sgrubs/ /skyon can khyod kyi nyes pa kun/ /dran drod ma smra so sor 'dug /khyod la gsol rag ci ma lus/ /gzhan yang tshigs su bcad pa la//
135a4(mdo 'grel): ding bya sang bya le lo phyi shol gyis/ /sngon 'das dus nas da srid 'byangs pas chog /'chi bdag dgra dang bar bya bstod nas ni/ /bka' bsngos myur du bya ba'i mi rigs sam/ /skra dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs grangs kyang/ /byis
135a5(mdo 'grel): pa shad ma bye dang 'dra ba na/ /don la mkhas pas brtags na snying re rje/ /gzhan yang bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi/ /sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/ /legs spyad gang yin thams cad kyang/ /khong khro gcig gis
135a6(mdo 'grel): 'joms par byed/ /zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig pa med/ /bzod pa lta bu'i dka' thub med/ /de bas bzod pa nan tan du/ /sna tshogs tshul bzhin sgom par bya/ /zhe sdang zug rngu'i sems 'chang na/ /yid ni bde ba'i nyams mi myong/ /sgyu mar
135a7(mdo 'grel): bsams nas bzod par bsgom/ /gal te bcos su yod na ni/ /de la mi dga' byar pang med/ /'on te gcos su med na yang/ /de la mi dga' byas ci phan/ /la la bdag gi khrag mthong na/ /phyir zhing khong dgrar 'gyur ba'ang yod/ /
135b1(mdo 'grel): la la gzhan gyis khrag mthong na/ /'bog cing brgyal bar 'gyur ba'ang yod/ /de ni sems kyi rang brtan dang/ /sngar ma'i tshul las gyur pa yin/ /de bzhin dge ba sgrub pa yang/ /sems thag bcad dam mi gcad zan/ /khyim bar 'bral bar ma
135b2(mdo 'grel): nus dang/ /so nam yal bar dogs pa dang/ /dam chos sgrubs par bsam pa dang/ /yun gyis bde ba sgrub pa ni/ /gnyis ka yong yang 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sbyin pa btang bar bya ba dang/ /zad par dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /dpa' bo bya
135b3(mdo 'grel): bar bsams pa dang/ /shi bar dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrug /mang po dga' bar bya ba dang/ /khro gtum bya ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /slab la 'grus par bya ba dang/ /zang zing btsal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /btsun pa'i phul du dbyung ba dang//
135b4(mdo 'grel): yul la chags pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /kun gyis bkur bar 'dod pa dang/ /spyod lam ngan pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /rgyal po mnyes par bya ba dang/ /khyim na nyal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /sangs rgyas sgrub par bya ba dang/ /sdig pa
135b5(mdo 'grel): spyad pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/ /de bzhin gang zhig sgrub par bya ba dang/ /de bzhin gang zhig sgrubs na yang/ /sems thag bcad par byed par bya/ /'on tang dgos pa thams cad 'grub/ /'jig rten mgon pos de skad gsungs/ /mdo sde
135b6(mdo 'grel): rnams las bslab pa snang/ /rtag tu mdo sde blta bar bya'o/ /de dag gang zhig sgrub na de/ /rlung med g.yo ba'ang med pa bzhin/ /bsod nams brtson 'grus med mi 'gyur/ /sgyid lug snyom pa'i stobs bcom ste/ /nyin mtshan spyang
135b7(mdo 'grel): par sgrub par bya'o/ /des na 'bras bu med mi srid/ /srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal ba dang/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/ /dgos pa ma lus bos pa bzhin/ /sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu na/ /bdag? dang? 'dra?
136a1(mdo 'grel): ngan pas ci zhig smos/ /de bas 'jig rten bsam pa gtang/ /sems can rnyed pa med la smod/ /rnyed pa can la mi snyan brjod/ /rang bzhin 'grogs dga' de dag gis/ /dga' ba ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/ /des
136a2(mdo 'grel): na dben par gnas par bya'o/ /bdag gis mkhas pa'i rjes snyags la/ /bdag yod gdams ngag dran byas te/ /gnyid dang rmugs pa bzlog par bya/ /rgyal sras thugs rje chen po ltar/ /rigs pa'i srin du gzugs bya ste/ /
136a3(mdo 'grel): byis pa'i spyod pa btang byas nas/ /mdor na bdag dang gzhan rnams la/ /phan par 'ba' zhig lhur bya'o/ /de ltar gdams ngag byas nas kyang/ /bdag gis spyad par ma grub cing/ /nyams kyis stsogs par ma gyur na/ /tshe rabs
136a4(mdo 'grel): kun tu phan pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/ /sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing/ /dge ba ma lus rdzogs byed pa/ /'di dag brjod pa'i bsod nams gang/ /gal te de la gzugs yod gyur/ /gang+gA'i bye ma
136a5(mdo 'grel): snyed kyi ni/ /'jig rten khams su shod mi 'gyur/ /tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di/ /gtsugs lag khang ngam mchod khang ngam/ /mchod rten sku gzugs spyan mnga' 'am/ /gzhan duAng rung ste 'di skad brjod/ /nyin mtshan lin ni gsum
136a6(mdo 'grel): gsum brjod/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang/ /sgo gsum btud de skyabs su mchi'o/ /mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdig pa'i las las bzlog bgyid cing/ /bsod
136a7(mdo 'grel): nams thams cad yongs su gzung/ /lus can rnams kyi bsod nams dag /kun la rjes su yi rang ngo/ /bdag ni spyis btud thal sbyar te/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad dang/ /'gro gnas rab tu bzhugs slad du/ /rdzogs pa'i
136b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams la gsol/ /de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang// bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang/ /des ni sems can thams cad kyang/ /bla med byang chub sems ldan shog /sems can thams cad dri med dbang/ /yongs
136b2(mdo 'grel): rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing/ /spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang/ /'tshe ba bzang dang ldan par shog /lus can dag ni thams cad kyang/ /lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing/ /yo byad thams cad mdza' spang ba/ /'khor ba ji srid mi zad
136b3(mdo 'grel): shog /bud med thams cad rnam kun tu/ /phan tshun phrag dog 'gran sems dang/ /rang bzhin bzang por skyes gyur nas/ /skyes mchog nyid du gyur bar shog /lus can thams cad rig pa dang/ /rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog /lus can
136b4(mdo 'grel): kha dog ldan pa dang/ /gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang/ /blta na sdug cing nad med dang/ /stobs can tshe dang ldan par shog /thams cad thabs la mkhas gyur te/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar ba dang/ /dkon mchog gsum la
136b5(mdo 'grel): gzhol ba dang/ /dmu rgad mi nag med par shog /gtsug lag khang dang dben gnas kyi/ /gnas dang nye bar dkar par shog /sangs rgyas chos nor ldan pa dang/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa dang/ pha rol phyin drug ldan par shog /
