206a7(mdo 'grel): de dag gis 'khor ba'i sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe zad pa dang/ nyon mongs pa mgo mnyam du zad pa'i gang zag ces bya ba rim bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor gang gis na byang chub sems
206b1(mdo 'grel): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod do/ /rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ 'di snyam du kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo//
206b2(mdo 'grel): gsog go /snying po med pa'o/ /kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ya ma brla'o snyam du sems na 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang
206b3(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byang phyogs 'di nyid nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/
206b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang na lta ba'i gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/ /kun
206b5(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub yin no/ /sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang dbu rnams ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthong ting la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing bsnum
206b6(mdo 'grel): pa g.yas su 'khyil pa mdzes par skyes par yin ni/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du zin na zla ba/ nyi ma 'di gnyis kyang 'jig rten na yod par mi 'gyur/ zla ba gcig dang/ zla phyed dang/ dus dang los khyung kar rnams kyang 'jig
206b7(mdo 'grel): rten na snang bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ phyin ci log bzhi las skyes pa dang/ las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su zin pa yin na/ 'di na khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'di shes pa'i rgyu
207a1(mdo 'grel): gang yin zhes ston par byed/ byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/ 'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin gyi/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas ma yin no//
207a2(mdo 'grel): snyam du sems pa'i sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa' i chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi sems yongs su dag na byang chub sems dpa' i sbyin gnas yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos na
207a3(mdo 'grel): bdag gis sems can dbul po 'di dag sbyin pa'i sa bsdus nas/ gzhan gyi rdzas la rku bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs par sems bskyed par bya'o/ /gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma yin la/ gzugs las gud na yang chos kyi dbyings
207a4(mdo 'grel): med do/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpas stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par mi bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir dge ba'i chos thams cad
207a5(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad ma mchis pa lags te/ mtshan ma ni brtags pa tsam kun tu rtog pa las 'byung ba lags na/
207a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa'i zhes bgyi 'am 'on te srid pa tha
207a7(mdo 'grel): ma pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang nges pa yin no/ /phyir mi ldog pa dang/ srid pa tha ma pa yang nges pa yin no/ /yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sar
207b1(mdo 'grel): ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o/ /'phags pa chos thams cad shin tu rgyas par bsdu ba las/ 'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba las kyi sgrib pa ni phra ba'o/ /'jam dpal gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la/ la la ni bzang bar 'du
207b2(mdo 'grel): shes/ la la ni ngan par 'du shes/ de ni dam pa'i chos spong ba'o/ /gang chos spong ba des chos spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa yin no/ /gnas 'jog las bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la
207b3(mdo 'grel): gnas par 'dod pas/ nang par langs nas dge slong ngam/ bram ze 'am gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig gis drung du song ste/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas la/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o//
207b4(mdo 'grel): bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di/ dus 'di nas gzung ste/ gang do nub gyi mtshan mo 'di dang/ sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/ dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje
207b5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan par bgyis la/ sems can dang srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog spur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dag ji srid 'tsho'i
207b6(mdo 'grel): bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog nas dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog spur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/ srog gcod pa
207b7(mdo 'grel): las slar ldog pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang/ sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spangs shing/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/ ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang
208a1(mdo 'grel): ldan par gyis la/ sems can dang/ srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phru mo grog spur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa yang spangs te/ srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ yan lag dang po 'dis bdag
208a2(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su sgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid do/ /ji ltar srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa de bzhin du ma byin pa len pa dang/ mi tshangs par spyod pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba dang/ 'bru'i chang dang btsos pa'i chang myos par
208a3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang/ glu gang dang rol mo la sgra dang/ phreng ba dang/ spos nyug pa dang/ rgyan dang/ kha dog 'char ba dang/ khri stan mthon po dang/ khri stan chen po dang/ dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs te dus ma yin pa'i kha zas slar ldog par
208a4(mdo 'grel): bgyi'o/ /ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar dus dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog pa de bzhin du/ bdag che ge mo spang dus 'di nas bzung ste/ gang de nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang sang
208a5(mdo 'grel): nyi ma shar gyi bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/ dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/ /yan lag brgyad pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom par de dag gis bslab pa la rjes su slob bo rjes su sgrub po/ /rjes su bgyid
208a6(mdo 'grel): de ltar la ni gnyis de ltar lan gsum du'o/ /'di lta ste yul chen po bcu drug la/ ang ga dang/ ma ga d+ha dang/ ka shi dang/ bri dzaM dang/ mal la dang/ bun tra dang/ srag ba dang/ ka ma dang/ a ban ti dang/ ku ru dang/ pad tsa la dang/ pad
208a7(mdo 'grel): dang dpa' ste dang/ ya ba na dang kam po rnams so/ shes rab 'bum pa las/ ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma rig pa'o/ /lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ sems
208b1(mdo 'grel): can dang/ srog dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ /de bzhin du tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rwada ti'i bu
208b2(mdo 'grel): sems can gang phyin ci log pas byung ba'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par sgrub ste/ las kyi rnam par smin pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las 'byung ba yongs su gzung
208b3(mdo 'grel): zhing sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ lha dang mi'i 'gro ba mngon par grub bo/ /'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de
208b4(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad kyang rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog par spangs par gyur to/ /ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba yang de bzhin/ dga' bo de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyed la gtang de/ dga' bo gal te khyed kyis ngas
208b5(mdo 'grel): gang chos ji snyed bshad pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs pa ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud bsan te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du mi gzung ngo/ dge
208b6(mdo 'grel): bo khyod kyis gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chung bsan tam/ bor bar gyur na des ni dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du bzung ngo/ /bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ sems can dang/
208b7(mdo 'grel): srog dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shed can dang/ shed bdag dang/ byed ba po la sogs pa stong pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'dod pa'i 'dod
209a1(mdo 'grel): chags dang/ gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /bla ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do?/ /gang ci
209a2(mdo 'grel): yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs/ byis
209a3(mdo 'grel): pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs
209a4(mdo 'grel): su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa ni chags par mi byed do zhes 'doms par byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das
209a5(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA radwa ti'i bu ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu yod dam/ yod par gyur tam/ yod par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma
209a6(mdo 'grel): lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/ lha'i mig des chos thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/ des chos de dag la gnas shing lam mngon par sgrub
209a7(mdo 'grel): po/ /shA radwa ti'i bu cig nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad? de sems can yongs su smin par byas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stogs? bcu dang/ mi 'jigs
209b1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' o? snyam du sems sam/ gsol pa/ de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/ /bka' 
209b2(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar sems/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rmi lam dang/ sgyu ma dang/ sgra snyan dang/ mig yor dang/ chu zla dang/ mig sgyu dang/ sbrul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209b3(mdo 'grel): bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar lam nas sbrul pa'i bar dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma
209b4(mdo 'grel): mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam bar shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par
209b5(mdo 'grel): shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug do/ /de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid phyir mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ni sgyu ma dang/ sgra snyan dang/ mig
209b6(mdo 'grel): yor dang/ chu zla dang/ smig rgyu dang/ sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa'i gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o/ /de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub sems
209b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing dbang ba dang/ skrag par mi 'gyur lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yin la/ thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ mi dge
210a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu 'ongs na de ltar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan ba 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngang la skrag bar mi 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs la
210a2(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa de gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs
210a3(mdo 'grel): so/ /tshor ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag ces bya bar rtog de de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa
210a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ zhi ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba la sogs te de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bka' 
210a5(mdo 'grel): stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos ces bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang/ gzhan yang de ma yin pa de 'dus byas kyis khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang/ dran pa nye bar
210a6(mdo 'grel): gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar te de dag gis 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i gang gang la
210a7(mdo 'grel): skye ba med cing 'jigs pa med pa de dang/ gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid mnor? ba/ de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa/ de bzhin chos kyi dbyings chos skyon med
210b1(mdo 'grel): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mdza' ste/ de dag ni dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' zang zing med par chos sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ chos ston pa'i tshe chos kyis sbyin pa des chung ngu
210b2(mdo 'grel): na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni zang zing med bar chos sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ chos ston pa'i tshe chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni zang zing med par chos sbyin pa'o/ /de la byang chub
210b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing/ bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyis
210b4(mdo 'grel): zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma
210b5(mdo 'grel): dang rten pa yongs su spangs pa gang zhe na/ dge slong ma dang ge gol gtogs pa tsam du lhan cig mi gnas shing/ de'i rgyus yongs su skoms pa'i sems mi bskyed/ de'i rgyus gos thob par mi byed pa 'di ni dge slong ma dang rten pa yongs su spong ba'o//
210b6(mdo 'grel): shes par bya ba lnga gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang/ brjod du med pa dang/ 'dus ma byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyis dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o//
210b7(mdo 'grel): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su grub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/
211a1(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su mthong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyad pa gang zhe na/ mi dmigs
211a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyod ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam bar dag pa
211a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin ba thams cad dang/
211a4(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs
211a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs bar gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/ /chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum
211a6(mdo 'grel): du rnam par bkod pa ni yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
211a7(mdo 'grel): kyi theg pa bshad do/ /ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sbyan sgrib ba med pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i byed ma rnyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha
211b1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin ba la thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas bar 'gyur gyi phal cher nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar mthong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u
211b2(mdo 'grel): shi ka bla na med pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa gzhan pa/ mos pa dma' ba/ shes rab 'chal ba rnams kyis sgrub dka' o/ /lho phyogs la sogs pa bcur yang de dang 'dra bar gzigs ro/ /rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa shes rab
211b3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon gdags par sems shing/ phyir spang bar sems pa de dag kyang chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ rab 'byor dper na khyi la la zhig jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te las mi las zas btsal bar
211b4(mdo 'grel): sems pa dang 'dra? bar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab
211b5(mdo 'grel): ma lta bu'i mdo sde/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la bstan par sems par 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/
211b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' theg pa pa kha dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bya ba'i sems pa 'byung ste de yang bdud kyi las so/ /de bzhin du glang po rnyed la rjes btsal bar sems pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po lta
211b7(mdo 'grel): bar 'dod ba la ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems la/ ngo mthong nas 'di dang rgya mtsho mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na mkhas pa yin nam/ rang 'byor gyi gsol pa ma lags so/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yang bdud
212a1(mdo 'grel): kyi lam su 'byung/ de bzhin du rnam par rgyal byed kyi khad pa brtsig? bar 'dod pa la chad nyi zla'i gzhal med khar las len pa dang/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ khams kyi rgyal phran mthong nas de de nas
212a2(mdo 'grel): bsnyoms? pa dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa spangs nas drug cu pa tshol ba dang/ nor bu rin thang med pa rnyed nas mching bu dang/ sgrun par sems pa de dag mi mkhas pa bzhin du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing theg pa dman pa
212a3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa gang bdud kyi las su 'byung/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems gyis yongs su ma bzung na byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa pa de dag bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de dag nye zhor 'byung
212a4(mdo 'grel): ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du reg par bya'o/ /byang
212a5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ /nyan thos gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod cing ston pa dang 'chad cing 'grel pa dang/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang
212a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /gsol ba /bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan
212a7(mdo 'grel): nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do/ /gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i
212b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid nges chos thams cad mchos par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid gyis chos thams cad yod
212b2(mdo 'grel): do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/ chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs nges ni 'di ltar stong ba nyid kyi mtshan nyid
212b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ dben pa'i mtshan nyid gang mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid nges chos thams cad yod do/ /bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la nyan thos kyi theg pa ba dang/ rang sangs
212b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi theg pa ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa bas bslab par bya ba dang/ gang la ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bslabs pas rang rang gi sa la gnas par 'gyur pa'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
212b5(mdo 'grel): zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug pa'o/ /bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa
212b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ ngag gi rnam pa yod do/ /de dag gi bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang thun mong du yang gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de rnams thams cad du mi mnga' zhing mi dmigs so//
212b7(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob pa yin te/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o//
213a1(mdo 'grel): chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa las kyi rnam par smin pas bzung ba yin na/ khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa la dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te/ byang chub
213a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de yang longs
213a3(mdo 'grel): spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i rnam pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni
213a4(mdo 'grel): mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/ /ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ rtag pa med pa dang don
213a5(mdo 'grel): gcig pa ma yin pa dang/ 'ong ba med pa dang/ 'gro ba med pa dang/ spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa da ltar shes pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa 'am mi 'dzin pa gang yang
213a6(mdo 'grel): spyod dam/ gsol ba/ dgra bcom pa la yong yang nyal ba ma mchis na/ de ni rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa 'am ma 'dzin pa la spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/ la la ni nyan thos
213a7(mdo 'grel): kyi sprul pa'o/ /la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'o/ /la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/ /la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/ /skyes bu glen pa de dag
213b1(mdo 'grel): rnam pa zhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol ba/ bzhi gang lags/ bka' stsal pa/ skye bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zag mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te/ rab 'byor rgyu
213b2(mdo 'grel): dang po des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /chos zab mo rnams la yid ches pa dang/ dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/ rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro
213b3(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin te/ brtson 'grus med cing phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang gi spyod pa can
213b4(mdo 'grel): yin te/ bdag bstod cing/ gzhan smod par gyur pas rgyu bzhi pa des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur zhes 'byung/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa las bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal
213b5(mdo 'grel): bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos dben par gnas bca' bar bya ste/ 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar bya'o/ /mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug
213b6(mdo 'grel): la/ der mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i mtshan nas kyang smos te/ mtshan de yang thos te dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de phyogs de gal ba'i
213b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs de mngon du byas nas 'dug pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de ni gcig go /de bzhin
214a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag tu med pa dang/ spobs pa dpag tu med pa de bzhin du bkod pa cig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/ mi skye ba gcig las chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag dpag tu med pa
214a2(mdo 'grel): gang de la 'byung bar rig par bya'o/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa ma byung ba nas dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos nas yid dga' zhing rangs par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga'i 'khor 'di nyid  
214a3(mdo 'grel): na 'dug pa yin par 'od srungs khyod kyis rtogs par gyis shig 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das
214a4(mdo 'grel): gang chos ci la yang mi sems shing rnam par mi sems pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/ /gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das gang chos ci yang mi sems pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'o/ /shes
214a5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa las bka' stsal pa/ rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam pa gnon pa chos thams cad ni phyin ci log pa byung bas smig rgyu dang 'dra'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'du
214a6(mdo 'grel): ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'o 'bral ba zhes bya ba ni chang pa'o/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ chos thams cad ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste/ phyin ci log de la yang 'du ba dang/ 'bral ba gang yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
214a7(mdo 'grel): kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ phyin ci log gi dngos po dmigs su med do/ /de'i byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/ phyin ci log ni med pa/ yang dag pa ma yin par brdzun pa slu ba gsog gi chos can
214b1(mdo 'grel): de la chos gang yang mi dmigs pas de ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/ /phyin ci log ces bya ba 'di ni sems can rnams la slu ba'o/ /'di ni sems can rnams kyi yang drug pa ma yin pa la yongs su rtog pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye
214b2(mdo 'grel): bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yang pa
214b3(mdo 'grel): min yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o/ /gsol pa ci'i slad du mchis pa ma lags pa la mchis zhes bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ gzugs stong pa bco brgyad kyi phyir yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du bsgri'o?/ /de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor
214b4(mdo 'grel): 'di snyam du gyur te/ ji ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni bdag gis sngan chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/ /'di ltar lha'i bu rnams kyis mngon par
214b5(mdo 'grel): gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni ldum bu las skyes pa ma yin/ chu las skyes pa ma yin/ thang las skyes pa ma yin no/ /'di ltar me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/ me tog ldum bu las byung pa ma yin na snyam mo/ /ko'u shi kas gsol ba/
214b6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag gi chos nyid de gang lags she na/ 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad kyi chos nyid dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/ /de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ nang
214b7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nas 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes kyi bar lags so/ /de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/ de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis
215a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'gag pa dang/ gnas pa dang/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byad? ba dang/ 'phel ba dang 'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/ /byang
215a2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang/ bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ brtson 'grus
215a3(mdo 'grel): rtsom pa dang/ bzod pa sgrub pa dang/ tshul khrims bsrung ba dang/ sbyin pa sbyin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen par rig par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
215a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dngos po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la sogs pa bsnyen pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ stug po bkod pa las/ lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/ stug na gnas la stug na med/ zhing de
215a5(mdo 'grel): dri med bsod nams te/ /stug po snying po shin tu mdzes/ /de bzhin thar pa thar shes la/ /zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste/ /stug po de ni yul du rtag /mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang/ /stobs dang
215a6(mdo 'grel): mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin/ /yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus/ /sangs rgyas de ni rnam par mdzes/ /stug po thar mchog ye shes te/ /chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang/ /sdug te rnal 'byor can gyi gnas/ /mun pa'i rgya las rab 'das nas
215a7(mdo 'grel): stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes/ /phyogs 'di bka' las grub pa ste/ /rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min rdul phran rnam par gzhig pa dang/ /rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te/ /rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas/ /rdul phran mchog /ces
215b1(mdo 'grel): de phyir brjod/ /dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams/ /phra sogs che ba'i yon tan dang/ /'thob dang 'dod 'byor sgrags pa dang/ /bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang/ /ji ltar 'dod par rung ba rnams/ /thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na/ /rnam par gnas shing
215b2(mdo 'grel): rab tu rtse/ /de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang/ /rtog tu bag chags ldan gyur pa/ /rnam par shes pa rnam bdun po/ /'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste/ /lha dang lha min 'bar ba dang/ /lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes pa
215b3(mdo 'grel): 'ang/ /de nyid rgyud ni gyur pa ste/ /tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis/ /gang tshe lus 'di bor gyur pa/ /de tshe lus 'di bor ba ste/ /shes bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/ /de ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/ /yid ni gro bar rab tu brtags/ /yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/ /lhag
215b4(mdo 'grel): ma dbang po lngar yang gnas/ /yid ches lus dang mi ldan par/ /chos rnams ston par byed pa ni/ /mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis/ /bdag kyang chud gzon gzhan chung gzon/ /'jig rten rdul phran bsags pa min/ /phyogs dang gnas su mi
215b5(mdo 'grel): 'gro'o/ /de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du/ /ci yang rtsom par mi byed do/ /lha yul gnas nas gnas pa la/ /sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtog /phung po gang zag bdag med par/ /rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur cing/ /chos kyi dngos po yod ma shig
215b6(mdo 'grel): nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/ /ting nge 'dzin rgyal po las/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes bya la sogs pa 'byung/ stong pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar/ /nges don mdo sde dag gi bye brag shes//
215b7(mdo 'grel): gang las sems can gang zag /skyes bu bstan/ /chos de thams cad dang ba'i don du shes/ /'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang/ /de ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jig mi byed/ /de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu 'byung/ /lhag spyod kyis ni ting
216a1(mdo 'grel): 'dzin 'dir bsgom bzhin/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed pa byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spong/ /zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gis drung 'ong zhes/ /byis pa chos la ston par spong mi byed/ /byis pa dag gi rang bzhin
216a2(mdo 'grel): rgyud rig nas/ /mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/ /ji srid du ni byis pa legs bsnyen kyang/ /de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /byis pa dang ni byis pa mthun 'byor pa/ /ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/ /mkhas pa
216a3(mdo 'grel): dang ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang/ /mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying khu bzhin/ /byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/ /de la gnod pa byung ba byis pa dga' / /de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnams spangs te/ /ri dwags bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas
216a4(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/ /shes rab dman bsten bdag gi mtho ris nyams/ /byang chub 'thob par gal 'gyur snyam ste/ byis pa rnams dang nam yang yod mi sten/ /bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan
216a5(mdo 'grel): phan sems can gnyen rtsa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpa' bo dgra bzhi
216a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtsod pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi sku mchog mnga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba/ /shes rab shin tu yangs pa nam mkha' i dkyil du
216a7(mdo 'grel): shar/ /don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/ lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /'di na snod min sems can 'ga' yang med/ /bde gshegs yon tan de dag
216b1(mdo 'grel): dpag med de/ /mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin/ /yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/ /zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/ /bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par rig nas
216b2(mdo 'grel): mchod yon chen po rim gyis gsol te/ zhal zas gsol cing bdar to/ /'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag /bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/ /de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te/ /sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/ /bka' stsal pa/ zla
216b3(mdo 'grel): 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis/ /sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong/ /sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing/ /stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang/ /de dag
216b4(mdo 'grel): thams cad mtshan nyid gcig /de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon po de 'dra bas/ /sus kyang sha'i mig gis ni/ /nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/ /dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku/ /sku ni chos las byung ba ste/ /gzugs kyi sku ni nam du yang/
216b5(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas gdags par nus ma yin/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku mthong nas/ /'dren pa mthong zhes smra mod kyi/ /nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/ /sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/ /gang gi 'khrul pa ci mthong yang/ /de dag gi ni nyes mi brjod/ /ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/
216b6(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu de 'dra 'thob par 'gyur/ dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i phan yon ni bcu ste/ bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang/ 'du ba'i ring ba bas kyang ring du spong ba dang/ de la rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba dang/ gnod pa med par gnas pa dang/ zad pa 'phel bar mi
216b7(mdo 'grel): byed pa dang/ rtsod pa'i gzhir mi byed pa dang/ shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang/ shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang/ sems thar pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun tu 'gyur ba dang/ myur du rnam par grol ba mngon du byed pa'o/ /lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi
217a1(mdo 'grel): bde pa spangs te rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rab tu byung nas kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing/ bden par gnas pa dang bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs
217a2(mdo 'grel): par bya'o/ /sngon sangs rgyas gzi brjid tshogs rgyal gyis chos bshad nas/ rgyal po brten 'byin rab tu byung ngo/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gleng gling gi mi rim gyis rab tu byung ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'bras ma rmos ma btab par 'khrungs
217a3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ chos gos kyang rang byung/ g.yog kyang lha rnams kyis byas so/ /'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/ /ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad pa/ /tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste/ /thams cad brjod par nus ma yin/ /tshig gi rnam par bsgoms na ni/ /de dag
217a4(mdo 'grel): thams cad bsgoms par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas ji snyed thams cad kyis/ /chos rnams mang por bshad pa/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/ /chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/ /de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/ /sems can bsam gyis
217a5(mdo 'grel): mi khyab cing/ /dpag tu med pa byang chub 'du ba/ /chos rnams mig yor lta bu yang/ /gang gis ngo bo nyid shes pa/ /de dag gzugs kyi lus su ni/ /sangs rgyas sku la mi blta'o/ /chos 'di lus gzugs med pa ste/ /'di la lus
217a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs gang yang med/ /chos 'gags lus gzugs med pa ni/ /de ni sangs rgyas sku lus so/ /gang dag chos kyi skur lta ba/ /de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/ /de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong/ /'khor
217a7(mdo 'grel): ba dag ni 'phel byed cing/ /so so'i skye bo de dag 'khor/ /so so tha dad 'gro bas na/ /so so'i skye bor brjod pa yin/ /'du shes 'di ni spang snyam du/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /'du shes spos la sprod pa ste/ /'du shes las ni de mi brda?/ /su
217b1(mdo 'grel): yis 'du shes 'di dag 'byung/ /su yis 'du shes 'di bskyed byas/ /sus ni 'du shes reg par byas/ /sus ni 'du shes 'gag par gyur/ /gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos ma brnyes/ 'dir ni don de bsam par gyis/ /de
217b2(mdo 'grel): bas 'du shes med par 'gyur/ /bsam pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/ /mthar gyis rnam par bsam bya ste/ /bsam pa thams cad rnam spangs na/ /de nas bsam du med par 'gyur/ /'di ni dkar chos rnam smin te/ /'du byed med pas mthong bar
217b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ /sems can kun gyis rnam bsams pa/ /skad cig gcig la rab tu shes/ /sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang/ /rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te/ /yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang ba/ /rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul/ /rdzing bu'i 'gram na
217b4(mdo 'grel): gnas pa rnams/ /de dag de las chu 'thungs nas/ /thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni/ /'jig rten gyi yang mchod rten 'byung/ /de bzhin du pad+ma la sogs pa sprul nas/ /de'i dri tshor ba dang de las sgra grag pa mnyan pas kyang dug gsum spong ba la
217b5(mdo 'grel): sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' bde byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin la mchod par lag pa g.yas pa ras bcos bus bkris te mar me btang nas ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo las skad che zhing 'jam pas
217b6(mdo 'grel): sgrags pa dang/ sa yang g.yos lha rnams kyang dad pa skyes nas mchod pa byed do/ /de nas lha phal mo ches byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs sems can gyis don mang du byas par 'byung/ /chos dang zang zing sbyin pa ni bsngo ba bzhin byas te/
217b7(mdo 'grel): thabs mkhas pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs de thob pa dang/ bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob pa ston par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang/ longs spyod gang gis sems can
218a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod de dag phrad pa dang/ bdag gi lus gang gis sems can la chos dang zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa 'thob par 'gyur pa'i lus 'dzin par bsngo ba'o/ /gcig la gcig kyang
218a2(mdo 'grel): gnod sems byas na ni/ /de la tshul khrims thos pas skyob mi nus/ /bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob ma nus/ /sbyin pas mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pas min/ /skyes bu khyu mchog gis ni dam pa'i chos/ /'jig par 'gyur tshe
218a3(mdo 'grel): gang dag btang snyoms sgom/ /de yis rgyal ba bkur sti byas ma yin/ /'dred pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/ /rgyal po dpa' bas sbyin gyis dge slong me tog zla mdzes bsad/ /nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob cig /de yi sbyong la'ang
218a4(mdo 'grel): dga' bar ma byed cig /sangs rgyas yon tan dag las sems ma btang/ /myur du sangs rgyas rgyal po'i dbang por 'gyur/ /mi gtsang bas ni rtag tu 'dod chags tshar gcad do/ /byams pa yis kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom//
218a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyis ni gti mug nyon mongs dra ba bsal/ /ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig rten kun na rab tu mdzes/ /rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/ /gang 'grub pa dang smon pa dang 'byor pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul zhes bya'o/ /de la thos pa yongs su 'tshol
218a6(mdo 'grel): ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sde snod dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sde snod dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i sde snod kun 'dzin cing bsgoms pa'o/ /sbyangs pa mthong ba gang zhe na/ yi dam la brtan pa'o/ /khrel yod pa gang zhe na/ mu tsor mi smra lo'o/ /skyes
218a7(mdo 'grel): bu dam pa dang brten pa gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas la brten pa'o/ /skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/ dmigs pa can dang/ le lo can rnams yod pa'o/ /rnyed
218b1(mdo 'grel): pa med kyang sems mis 'gong ba gang zhe na/ bdag gis byas pa la so sor rtog pa'o/ /khyim pa dang mi sten pa gang zhe na/ zang zing ci yang rnam par spong ba'o/ /rab tu byung ba la rten pa gang zhe na/ mi rigs pa spong ba dang/ rigs pa tshol
218b2(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /de la rnal 'byor du spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa'o/ /sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste/ /tshul yang rgya chen bstan pa yin/ /chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/ /yon tan rgya cher thob par 'gyur
218b3(mdo 'grel): ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhing te/ /rin chen 'od zer rgya che gang/ /de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya/ /sems can spyod pa rgya che ste/ /de dag bstan pa 'am rgya che'o/ /lung gi don yang rgya che bas/ /de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya//
218b4(mdo 'grel): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin/ /'thab bral gyi rab 'thab bral/ /dga' ldan gyi yongs dga' ldan/ /'phrul dga' i rab 'phrul dga' / /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi dbang byed/ /bdud
218b5(mdo 'grel): kyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal po ded dpon/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don ni bdun gyi rab tshangs pa/ tshangs ris kyi mi mched kyi bdag po 'od gsal gyi 'od gsal/ dge rgyas kyi dge rgyas/ 'bras bu che ba'i 'bras bu che/ gnas gtsang ma'i dbang phyug
218b6(mdo 'grel): chen po/ /'og min gyi dri med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan 'dod kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin na/ chos 'dod pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam la dga' ba'i theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin no/ /chos kyi kun
218b7(mdo 'grel): dga' la dga' bas gnas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' i don gyi dbang lnga mthong ba'i thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes te/ lnga ni thos pa las shes rab 'byung ba dang/ 'gyod pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par
219a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba rtogs par 'gyur ba dang/ sems can gyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dang/ mi 'jigs pas sems can gyi the tshom gcod pa'o/ /yang gnyis kyi phyir te/ yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pa dang/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'tsho
219a2(mdo 'grel): ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' phan yon lnga mthong nas/ rab tu 'byung ba las mos par 'gyur te/ lnga ni bdag gis las byas pa chud mi za ba dang/ bdag gis las byas pa bag chags kyis bsgoms pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad
219a3(mdo 'grel): las sems gtang pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyis mi smad pa dang/ bdag grol nas gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i dad pa rab tu thob nas phyin ci log las byung bar mthong
219a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes na chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no/ /chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta bar ltung par mi 'gyur te/ las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ sangs
219a5(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyis chos thams cad rnam par sgrub shes pa'o/ gnyis dang ldan na rtag pa'i lta bar mi ltung ste/ mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang/ skyes nas zhig cing zhu ste mi gnas par rnam par dbye ba shes pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
219a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/ lus dang sems kyis bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba de dag sgrub par mi byed pa dang/ ci nas de bzhin nyid du dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' dang/ chos
219a7(mdo 'grel): kyi dbyings kyis snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bus snyoms par 'jug ste/ de ni dmigs pa can gyis snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ /de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ bsam gtan de dag kyang shes rab kyi shes
219b1(mdo 'grel): che ba dang/ lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yin no/ /byang chub tu bsngos pa dang/ sems can smin par byed pa yang grub pa yin te/ de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa gcig gis mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du thug par
219b2(mdo 'grel): mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs te 'dug la/ chos zab mo'i gtam gyi bar chad byed de gtam sna tshogs gleng ba gang yin pa de dag pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /gzhan yang mi chos 'dod de nyan pa ni
219b3(mdo 'grel): nyung gi ma yin pa'i chos nyan pa ni mang ste/ chos smra ba btang ste/ gtam sna tshogs gleng na der zab mo'i chos la mos pa'i lha rnams ma rangs te/ 'di skad du 'jig rten pa'i gtam gleng zhing 'dug ste/ kye re ngan 'di na sangs rgyas kyi chos
219b4(mdo 'grel): mi grag go /zhes tshig ngan bton nas 'khor de nas 'dod do/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/ /bka' stsal pa de bzhin te/ chos thams cad
219b5(mdo 'grel): ni yid la byed pa las 'byung ste/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir/ de dag ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin rnam par 'grub po rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs de ni
219b6(mdo 'grel): mchis pa de gang du mchis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mes yongs su gang bar mthong na der chu'i phung po de gang du song/ /
219b7(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ de ni ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de ltar las su rung ba las gyur pa lags bka' stsal pa/ khyod nyan thos kyi sems las su rung ba las de ltar gyur par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mkha' 
220a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i de ltar mi 'dod dam/ nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni bdag nyid chu na gnas so snyam du sems so/ /skam na gnas pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho chen po skams par mthong ngo//
220a2(mdo 'grel): lha rnams sdug bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/ /mi rnams kyis ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags/ /dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod pa lags/ /gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags/ /yi dags sdug bsngal
220a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni skres dang skom/ /sangs rgyas bgro ba las/ de nas rgyal po sras rgyal spyan mngar 'dug cing rin po che'i gos lag na thogs pa dang gyon pa phud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
220a4(mdo 'grel): 'das bdag gi gos rin po che 'di ni sngon gyi las kyis rnam par smin pa las grub pa lags na bzhes su gsol/ bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag la brtson par bya ste/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas
220a5(mdo 'grel): dbang bskur bar dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thang du 'gro zhing dri bar bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir sgrub pa dang/ zab mo las mos pa brtsal ba'i phyir spro bar bya ba dang/ log par
220a6(mdo 'grel): lta ba dang/ bral bas yang dag par nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir spro bar bya'o/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa las/ rigs kyi mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni chos yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin na/ /byang chub
220a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang/ nye ba'i sems dpa' yin des na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo/ /stong pa nyid ces bya ba cis stong zhes na/ chos thams
220b1(mdo 'grel): cad kyis stong ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni gnas gsum du rig par bya ste/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang po ni dngos po thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i las can no/ /gnyis pa ni chos yongs su tshol ba dang/ len pa dang 'dzin
220b2(mdo 'grel): par byed la bdag tu zhen pa med pa nyid do/ /gsum pa ni chos zab mo mi spong ba dang/ /sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'jug cing sgyid lug pa med pa'o/ /bzhi po 'di dag ni bde pa'i rgyu yin te/ bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang/ dal
220b3(mdo 'grel): ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa rnyed pa yin/ lta ba drang po phun sum tshogs pa yin/ khyim bdag rnam par rgyal ba srung ba/ chung ma gzugs ldan ma/ shAkya'i gnags sbyin no/ /chos bzhi dang?
220b4(mdo 'grel): ldan na tshe rjes na yang dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur te/ bzhi ni chos tshol ba dang sbyin pas chog mi shes pa yin/ /sems can gzhan bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dzin du 'jug cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sgrogs pa yin/ chos zab mo la
220b5(mdo 'grel): bzod pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i phyir yang mi g.yeng zhing/ chos yid la bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin can yid la/ chos zab mo la bzod cing 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin no/ /chos bzhi ni theg pa chen po la
220b6(mdo 'grel): zhugs pa'i mchog sgrub pa yin te/ bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'jig cing dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba na dam pa'i chos tshol ba la brtson pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnam par 'jig pa na phyis 'chos shing
220b7(mdo 'grel): lus dang srog la bab kyang chos mi gtong pa yin/ sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na snying rje bskyed pa yin/ snying rje thob nas brtson 'grus brtsom zhing/ nam zhig bdag sangs rgyas nas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gzhil ba'i phyir
221a1(mdo 'grel): chos bstan par bya snyam pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba sgrub pa yin la/ sems can gyis gos la sogs pas lan glan pa ni zag pa dang
221a2(mdo 'grel): bcas pa yin na/ ji ltar des de la lan lon par 'gyur/ shA radwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bdag cag gis ni deng glan chad la lar chos bstan chos thog mar byang chub sems dpa' i theg pa las brtsams nas bstan par bgyi zhing/ nyan
221a3(mdo 'grel): thos kyi theg pa na slar gyis bstan par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'ga' zhig byang chub chen po la bzhag na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri bu khyed de ltar go gyon
221a4(mdo 'grel): pa legs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa de lta bu de la 'phya ba dang/ sting par byed pa dang/ mdo sde de lta bu spong bar byed pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdag nyid kyis bdag dbugs phyung zhing bde bar gnas pa yin te/ bzhi ni
221a5(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen po la zhugs nas/ longs spyod kyi bdogs thams cad gtang ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa yin/ chos zab mo'i ye shes kyis 'phags shing lus dang srog gi phyir yang mi gtong ba yin/ dge slong dam
221a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos smra ba dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis stobs pa yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur la/ tshe brjes nas kyang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
221a7(mdo 'grel): ji ltar smos pas 'jug par 'gyur/ 'khor los sgyur ba thob nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs
221b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i mchod rten zhig pa mthong nas bcos pa'i phyir spro zhing than 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tsam yang rtsig par byed pa yin/ mchod rten brtsigs pas skye bo mang po'i 'du ba'i sa lam gyi bzhi mdo lta bu mchod rten dang khang pa brtsigs pa 'am/ rdo rings dang
221b2(mdo 'grel): nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran pa gang yang rung ba byed pa 'di lta ste/ mngon par 'byung ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyis mchod rten brtsigs pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye zhing 'thab pa dang/ rtsod pa
221b3(mdo 'grel): byung ba mthong nas mi 'byed pa dang mthun par bsdum pa'i phyir brtson pa yin/ bstan pa'i chos rab tu 'jig pa ni tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang bsrung ba dang/ mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe rjes nas dge slong
221b4(mdo 'grel): tshur shog ces byas pas rab tu 'byung ba 'thob te/ bzhi ni bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dga' zhing gzhan na yang rab tu 'byung ba la dga' zhing gzhan yang rab tu 'byung ba 'dzin du 'jug la/ rnam pa thams cad du rab tu 'byung ba la rton par byed
221b5(mdo 'grel): de/ rab tu byung nas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byed 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/ /chos brtsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid kyang brtson zhing gzhan yang brtson pa'i 'jug pa yin/ bdag nyid brjod pa dang nges pa dang ldan zhing gzhan
221b6(mdo 'grel): yang de la 'god/ bdag nyid yo spyad bsnyungs shing shes pa sum tshogs la gzhan yang de dag la 'god pa yin/ bdag nyid thabs la mkhas shing smon lam gyi stobs can yin la/ gzhan yang de la 'god pa yin no/ /chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub
221b7(mdo 'grel): chen po las mi nyams pa yin te/ gzhi ni lhag pa'i sems kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' pa yin/ chos nyan pas ngoms mi shes pa yin/ mi slu bas bden par smra ba yin no/ /gang dag dge slong bsten byed
222a1(mdo 'grel): pa/ de dag mang du thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi rgyal pos bkur ba yin/ /de dag 'di ni nga rjes 'brang/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos las nyams pa yin zhe na/ chos stong pa nyid bstan kyang zang zing sngon du btang ste ston par
222a2(mdo 'grel): byed pa yin/ chos de dag ston kyang de bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin te/ de ltar na chos las nyams pa yin no/ /yab dang sras mjal ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i bsod nams dang
222a3(mdo 'grel): yon tan gyi tshogs kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal ba de snyed du brjod par mi nus so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems bskyed pa yang rung sems can
222a4(mdo 'grel): ji snyed pa thams cad la phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir don du ma skyes pa gcig kyang med do/ /sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang zad mi shes pa bsod nams kyang de snyed du 'gyur ro/ /sems de ltar bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyis
222a5(mdo 'grel): mchod pas kyang lan mi lon to/ /'jig pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing yin la/ sems bskyed pa ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol pa rnams mya ngan las 'das par gzhol bar byed pas zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
222a6(mdo 'grel): pa 'di nyid sngon bgrang du med pa'i sngon rol na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/ /chos rnams yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/ rnam par rtog pa chos 'byung kun kyang stong/ rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/
222a7(mdo 'grel): de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/ sangs rgyas brda' tsam nyid lags te/ /de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang/ /mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/ /kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/ /dkon mchog sprin las/ de de ltar sems mi mkhas
222b1(mdo 'grel): pas chos 'di dag gi sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o/ /chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o/ /chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o/ /zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ 'di snyam du chos 'di dag
222b2(mdo 'grel): thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/ sems las byung ba sems rkyen du 'gro ba ste/ sems shin tu bcil/ shin tu btul/ shin tu khong du chud par byas nas/ chos de dag thams cad shin tu bcil ba dang/ shin tu brtul pa dang/ shin tu khong du chud
222b3(mdo 'grel): par 'gyur te/ des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/ rgyu de dang rkyen des sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de sems nyid la sems gtong ngo/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhen gang 'di me tog gi
222b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa 'am/ 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
222b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/ /de bzhin du me tog gi shing la sogs pa yang bsngo'o/ /mdo sde dag mchod pa'i rnam pa rgya chen po dag nyan cing bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo'o/ /ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i
222b6(mdo 'grel): thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus shing lcog bzhig la de yang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thog mar rtsol zhing 'bad de brtson 'grus brtsom pa
222b7(mdo 'grel): mthong na/ de gnas de nas bslad ste de na 'khor dbye ba yang byas nas theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/ de ltar na gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas la mkhas pa yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' snod du ma gyur sems can rnams
223a1(mdo 'grel): la chos mi ston to/ /zhes 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/ klan ka tshol ba dang/ mu stegs can dang/ ri mo med pa dang/ ma dad pa mang ba dang/ g.yo dang rgyus klag pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i bsam pa can dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur
223a2(mdo 'grel): sti dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser snas glags pa dang/ glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa rnams la ma yin/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos la ser sna yang med sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi sems can 'di
223a3(mdo 'grel): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur to/ /zhes btang snyoms su 'jug go /sems can ci 'dra ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' chos ston zhe na/ sems can dad pa can dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i smin pa
223a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ snod du gyur pa dang/ g.yo med pa dang/ spyod lam mi 'chos pa dang/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti la mi chags pa dang/ tshul bzang po dang/ legs par ston nus pa dang/ dbang po rno ba dang/ ji skad bshad pa bzhin byed pa rnams la ston
223a5(mdo 'grel): to/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ de yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis zhes dang/ ri mo dang/ bcas pa dang theg pa chen po la gzhol 'bab/ bab pa yin pa ste des
223a6(mdo 'grel): na byang chub kyi sems ma snang ba yin no/ /skyon yang gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang/ bkur sti 'dod pa dang/ rigs pa dang rus dang lta ba la chags pa dang/ sdig pa chung ngus 'jigs par mi lta ba dang/ shi bas mi skrag pa dang/ mi bsam pa
223a7(mdo 'grel): sems pa dang/ lam yin pa la lam du 'du shes pa dang/ 'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang/ theg pa chen po dang/ de ston pa'i gang zag gi mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang/ rtsod pa lhur len pa dang/ brlang ba dang/ rtsub pa dang/ spyi brdol
223b1(mdo 'grel): che ba dang/ gtugs pa dang/ gtug/ pa dang/ ngag mi snyan pa dang/ mu tsor smra ba dang/ mi gcig par smra ba dang/ ngag tu smra ba ste/ de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ stong pa nyid bsgom pa la rnal
223b2(mdo 'grel): 'byor du byed do/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o/ /lang kar gshegs pa las lang ka'i bdag po sa bon cig las byung kyang/ myu gu dang/ ljang bu dang/ sog ma dang/ tshig pa dang/ yal ga dang/ me tog
223b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'bras bu dang/ gra ma'i bye brag yod pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos skye ba'i chos ma rig pa las byung du byung ba phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched la sogs pa thams cad dang khams gsum du skye ba'i chos thams cad la
223b4(mdo 'grel): bde ba'i dbyings dang/ brjod pa dang 'gro ba'i khyad par dag snang ste/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa yul na mngon par 'dzin par rab tu 'jug pa'i khyad par rab dang 'brid dang/ tha ma'i khyad par dang/ rnam par byung ba dang/
223b5(mdo 'grel): dge ba dang mi dge bar yang snang ngo/ /lang ka'i bdag po de dag gi tha dad pa'i khyad par du yang ma zad de/ rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams kyi lam la yang so so rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid snang na/ so so'i rnam par rtog pa
223b6(mdo 'grel): las byung ba'i chos dang chos med pa'i khyad par lta ci ste med yod do/ /blo gros chen po 'jim pa'i gong du rdul phra rab las tha dad pa zhig yin na ni de dag las brtsams pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na brtsams pas tha dad pa ma yin no//
223b7(mdo 'grel): tha mi dad pa ni khyad med par 'gyur ro/ /bzhin du 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang tha dad na ni de las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tha mi dad na ni 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa
224a1(mdo 'grel): 'gags na kun gzhi yang 'gags 'gyur na/ rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid ni 'gags par mi 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rnam par shes pa rnams kyi rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'gag gi las kyi mtshan nyid 'gag go /rang gi
224a2(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gag na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang 'gag par 'gyur te/ blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gags na ni smra ba 'di yang mu stegs byed pa'i chad par smra ba dang khyad med par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs byed rnams
224a3(mdo 'grel): kyi smra ba ni 'di lta ste/ yul 'dzin pa rgyun chad pas rnam par shes pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/ rnam par shes pa'i rgyun chad pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyun yang chad par 'gyur ro/ /mu stegs byed pa rnams ni rgyu las rgyun/ 'byung
224a4(mdo 'grel): bar smra ba'i rgyu ma gtogs par mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs dang snang ba 'dus pa las 'byung bar mi smra ste/ rgyu ni gtso bo dang/ skyes bu dang/ dbang phyug dang/ dus dang/ rdul phra mor smra ba'o/ /blo gros chen po snying rje chen po dang thabs la
224a5(mdo 'grel): mkhas pa lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang/ sems can gyis khams thams cad sgyu ma dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ mnyam pa nyid dang/ rkyen gyis ma brtsams pa dang/ nang dang phyi'i las rnam pa dben pa dang/ phyi rol sems su lta
224a6(mdo 'grel): bas mtshan ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa rnams/ rim gyis sa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la rjes su 'jug pa dang/ khams gsum bdag gis sems rgyu mar shin tu mos pas rab tu sgoms pa na/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
224a7(mdo 'grel): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gi sems snang ba med pa tsam la 'jug pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas pa rjes su 'thob pa skye ba bya ba dang ldan pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gzugs lta bu/ de bzhin
224b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i sku'i rjes su song song pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi sprul pa dang ldan pa/ stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang/ snying rje dang thabs kyis brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad du nye bar song ba sems dang yid
224b2(mdo 'grel): dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ rim gyis gnas 'phos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag /snang yang yod pa ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyang/ bshad pa rnam par
224b3(mdo 'grel): 'khrul pa yin/ /gzhan la gang zhig bstan pa de/ /gzhan la bshad par mi rung ste/ /ji ltar nad pa so so la/ /sman pa sman rnams gtong ba ltar/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/ /sems tsam du yang rab tu gsungs/ /mgon po
224b4(mdo 'grel): rnams ni gang gsung pa'i/ /so so rang rig spyod yul ni/ /rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/ /nyan thos rnams kyi 'ang de bzhin min/ /blo gros chen po gnas yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems snang ba'i gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa la rnam par
224b5(mdo 'grel): rtog pa'i spyod yul yongs su shes par 'dod pas 'du ba dang/ 'du 'dzi dang/ gnyid dang sgrib pa med par bya'o/ /srod dang tho rangs dang nam gyi gung thun la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/ /mu stegs can ngan pa'i gtsug lag dang/ gtam
224b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar bya zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par rtogs par bya'o/ /sna tshogs snang ba
224b7(mdo 'grel): yod ma yin/ /snang ba las ni sems 'byung ste/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bur/ kun gzhi mi la smad pa yin/ /blo gros chen pos rang sems snang ba'i rgyur rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang
225a1(mdo 'grel): gi sems snang ba'i rgyu ba'i cig car rim gyis 'jug pas sam/ ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/ bka' stsal pa/ rim gyis te cig car ma yin pa'i dpe a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang/ rdza mkhas snod byed pa
225a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sa las rtsi shing skye ba dang/ rol mo la mkhas pa rim gyis 'byung ba gsungs/ me long du gzugs brnyan snang ba rtog pa med pa cig car 'byung ba'i dpes/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can gyi rang gi sems snang ba'i
225a3(mdo 'grel): rgyud rnam par mi rtog cing snang ba med pa'i spyod yul cig car rnam par spyod do/ /zhes bstan/ blo gros chen po yang nyan thos kyi dngos po rnam par rtog pa'i rang bzhin mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po dang
225a4(mdo 'grel): dro ba dang/ gsher ba dang/ g.yo ba dang sra ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams byed pa med par 'byung ba rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang/ rigs pa dang lung gi tshad ma dang/ shin tu 'brel pa rnams mthong nas/ de'i rang bzhin la mngon par
225a5(mdo 'grel): zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ngo/ /blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' khong du chud nas zlog par bya'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ blo gros chen pos gsol pa/ ji ltar bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
225a6(mdo 'grel): sgro 'dogs pa dang/ skur pa'i lta ba ngan pa spangs pa'i blo can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya zhing/ sangs rgyas nas kyang rtag pa dang sgro 'dogs pa dang chad pa dang/ skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs te/ khyod
225a7(mdo 'grel): kyis sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mi skur bar 'gyur ba sgro 'dogs pa dang/ skur pa'i mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/ bka' stsal pa/ sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa dag /sems tsam po la yod pa min/ /lus dang longs spyod
225b1(mdo 'grel): gnas lta bu'o/ /sems ni su dag mi shes pa/ /sgo 'dogs pa dang skur pa la/ /mi mkhas de dag rab tu spyod/ /rang bzhin med pa ni rang bzhin thar ba med ba la dgongs te/ dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/ /blo gros
225b2(mdo 'grel): chen po thams cad kyi brten nas rgyu dang 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te/ 'di ltar phyi'i dang nang gi'o/ /de ltar phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni sbyin pa'i gong bu dang/ lag zungs dang 'khor lo dang srang bu dang
225b3(mdo 'grel): chu dang/ mi'i nan tan la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis rdza ma 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin du thags las snam bu dang/ rtsi kyang las re lnga dang/ sa bon las myu gu dang/ srub ma la sogs pa mi'i nan tan dang/ zho las mar 'byung ba 'di ni phyi'i
225b4(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba snga ma las phyi ma 'byung ba'o/ /nang gi ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang srid pa dang/ las dang chos 'di dag la sogs pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ming 'thob bo/ /blo gros chen po 'di dag las skyes
225b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang skye mched ces bya ba'i chos de dag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste/ de dag ni khyad par med pa las byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'o/ /blo gros chen pos gsol pa/ bcom
225b6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bshad pas/ rgyu rnam par brjod pa nyid bgyid kyi/ rang gi tshul gyis slar gzhil ba'i tshul mi gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang gang las dngos po rnams 'byung
225b7(mdo 'grel): pa 'di lta ste/ gtso bo dang dbang po dang/ skyes bu dang dus dang/ rdul phra mo 'jug pas/ rgyu las byung bar brjod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mchis pa las rkyen rnams kyis 'byung ba dang/ byung nas kyang 'jig par gsungs te/ /gang
226a1(mdo 'grel): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar gsungs pa 'di yang rgyu med par smra ba rnams brjod pa gsung gi rgyur smra ba ni ma lags so/ /'di yod na 'di yod do/ /zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gcig car?
226a2(mdo 'grel): gnas pa rnams la rung gi/ rim gyis 'byung ba la bltos par gnas pa rnams la ni ma yin te/ mu stegs kyi brjod pa nyid bzang gi khyod kyi bzang po ma lags so/ /ci'i slad du zhe na/ mu stegs kyi rten cing 'brel
226a3(mdo 'grel): par 'byung ba ma lags ba'i rgyus 'bras bu mngon par bsgrub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis rgyu yang 'bras bu la bltos/ 'bras bu yang rgyu la bltos pas rgyu rkyen yang 'dre ste/ de bzhin phan tshun thub pa ma mchis
226a4(mdo 'grel): par yang 'gyur ro/ /'di yod na 'di yod do/ /zhes brjod pa ni 'jig rten rgyu ma mchis par yang 'gyur ro/ /bka' stsal pa/ blo gros chen po gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa med pa dang/ rang gi sems snang ba tsam du
226a5(mdo 'grel): khong du chud pa'i phyir 'di yod pas 'di yod do/ /zhes brjod kyang rgyu dang byed par smra ba dang/ rgyu rkyen 'dres par yang mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen cing/ phyi rol gyi rang gi yul gyi dngos po med par
226a6(mdo 'grel): rang gi sems snang ba tsam du chud par de dag la ni 'di lta bu nyes par 'gyur gyi/ nga'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa la nyes par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni skyes bu gzhan gyi rigs sngags kyi mthus 'byung
226a7(mdo 'grel): ste/ rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyi mthu las ni ma yin no/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo lta ba ngan pa'i mtshan nyid du ltung ba'i bsam pa can/ rang gi sems snang ba tsam du ma rtogs pa
226b1(mdo 'grel): rgyu dang rkyen gyi byed pa las skye ba'i mtshan nyid du mngon par chags pa rnams glan pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du bstan to/ /blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste
226b2(mdo 'grel): ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros chen po 'di ltar rang gi blo rnam par dbang na rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po mi rigs pas na de'i phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med ces bya'o/ /srog dang lus dang gzhan ma yin pa la sogs pa dris
226b3(mdo 'grel): na 'jog pa ni mu stegs can sems tsam mi shes pa yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi ma yin gyis bud d+ha'i ni gzhag par lung bstan pa ye shes snod la bltos nas re zhig lung mi bstan par bya bar 'gyur/ log pa la bden par chags
226b4(mdo 'grel): pas ni phung po lnga 'dus pa dang/ 'byung pa las gyur pa rnams skye'o/ /blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa yang gnas kyi yul sna tshogs la mngon par chags shing 'dod pa'i rgyus 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor bar 'byung ngo//
226b5(mdo 'grel): sa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams la ni rgyu 'byung ba chen po rnams yod mod kyi/ 'byung ba chen po rnams la ni med do/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros chen po dngos po dang/ rtags dang/ mtshan nyid dang/ dbyings dang/ bya ba'i bdag nyid dang/
226b6(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba med pas 'byung ba rnams mi skye'o/ /dngos po la sogs pa'i bya ba 'dus pa las skye bar 'gyur gyi/ rtags dang mi ldan pa las ma yin no/ /de lta bas na blo gros chen po 'byung ba dang/ 'byung ba las byung ba'i mtshan
226b7(mdo 'grel): nyid ni mu stegs byed rnam par brtags pa yin te ngas ni ma yin no/ /brtags pa sna tshogs snang ba ni/ gzhan gyi dbang zhes brjod pa ste/ /rnam pa gzhan du brtags na ni/ /mu stegs smra la mkhas par 'gyur/ /rtog pa rtogs zhes
227a1(mdo 'grel): bya ba ste/ /mthong ba'i phyir ni rgyu las byung/ /rnam rtog gnyis las grol ba ni/ de nyid yongs su grub pa yin/ /blo gros chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni shes bya'i sgrib pa dang/ las kyi bag chags na
227a2(mdo 'grel): spangs pa'i phyir chos la bdag med pa'i ma gtogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho ma thob pas/ nyan thos rnams la theg pa gsum du bstan te/ gcig tu ma bstan no/ /blo gros chen po de dag nam
227a3(mdo 'grel): nyes pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs shing chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa de ni/ de dag bag chags kyis nyes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis myos pa med par gyur nas/ zag pa med pa'i dbyings nas slar sang de 'jig rten gyis
227a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i tshogs rnams yongs su bskang nas/ chos kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang byed pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa rnam par bzhag med kyang
227a5(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/ theg pa tha dad ngas bshad do/ /theg pa gcig tu ngas bshad do/ /sems kyi gnas shin tu gyur te/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gzhan dag rab tu thob pa dang/ mtshan dang dbang dang/ mdod
227a6(mdo 'grel): par shes pa du ma'i me tog rgyas shing yid kyi mgyogs pa dang/ mtshungs pa sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam gzugs brnyan lta bu 'byung ba las gyur pa ma yin pa la 'byung ba dang/ 'byung ba las gyur pa 'dra ba gzugs thams cad kyi yan lag sna tshogs
227a7(mdo 'grel): 'dus pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su song ba'i lus de ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pa yin gyis lus zhes bya'o/ /lta ba thams cad rnam bzlog cing/ /rtog dang brtag pa spangs pa ste/ dmigs med skye ba med pa ni/
227b1(mdo 'grel): sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /dngos min dngos po med min pa/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/ /de bzhin sems las grol ba ni/ /sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mdza' / /mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings
227b2(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs yid kyis lus rnams ni/ /sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/ /rnam rtog bag chags 'brel pa yin/ /sna tshogs sems las byung ba ste/ /mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang/ /'jig rten pa yi sems tsam mo/ /phyi rol snang ba yongs
227b3(mdo 'grel): med de/ sems ni sna tshogs rnams su snang/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra ba/ /sems tsam du na nges bshad do/ /bud d+ha'i drung du bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan ba zhig gis thams cad ma byas pa 'am/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa 'am gcig
227b4(mdo 'grel): pa 'am tha dad pa 'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang pa zhig zhus ba las/ bud d+has lan du de skad ces zer ba thams cad ni 'jig rten rgyang pan ba yin te/ kye bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'di ni khyod kyi nga'i ma yin no/ /bram ze de ni thog ma
227b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i dus nas spos pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las srid pa gsum skyes par ston? te/ bram ze de yang rang gi sems snang ba tsam khong du ma chud pas rnam par rtog pa 'byung gi /phyi rol gyi dngos po dmigs
227b6(mdo 'grel): pa las ni ma yin no/ /'di lta ste mu stegs byed rnams kyi bdag dang/ dbang po dang/ don gsum phrad ba lta bu nga'i ma yin no/ /kye bram ze da ni rgyur smra ba yang ma yin/ /rgyu med par smra ba yang ma yin te/ gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa nyid gzung ba
227b7(mdo 'grel): dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po rab tu bshig ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar ston to/ /khyod lta bu dang bdag tu 'dzin par ltung ba'i rgyud can gzhan dag gis ma rig go gzhan yang blo gros chen po bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la da
228a1(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad ces zer ro/ /kye go ta ma srid pa gsum po 'di mi shes pa dang/ sred pa dang/ las kyi rgyu las byung ngam/ de ste rgyu las ma byung/ bram ze 'di gnyis ka yang 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'o/ /kye go ta ma dngos po
228a2(mdo 'grel): thams cad rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ltung ba 'am/ kye bram ze de yang 'jig rten rgyang pan pa nyid yin te/ bram ze ji tsam du yid las rnam par g.yos pa dang/ phyi rol gyi kho na la mngon par chags shing rnam par rtog pa de tsam
228a3(mdo 'grel): du 'jig rten rgyang pan no/ /me long la ni ji ltar gzugs/ /snang yang yod pa ma yin ltar/ /bag chags dag gi me long la/ /byis pas sems ni rnam gnyis mthong/ /sems kyi snang ba ma shes bas/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam
228a4(mdo 'grel): gnyis skye/ /sems kyi snang ba yongs shes nas/ /rnam par rtog pa mi 'byung ngo/ /sems ni sna tshogs 'gyur ba ste/ /mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi yang spangs/ /ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/ /snang ba'i rnam pa snang ba med
228a5(mdo 'grel): srid gsum rnam par rtog tsam pas/ /phyi rol gyi ni don med do/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs snang ba ni/ /byis pa dag gis mi rtogs so/ /ji srid du yang dam bca' ba/ /de srid thams cad 'dres pa can/ /rang sems tsam du blta
228a6(mdo 'grel): bya ste/ /brtsod pa brtsal bar mi bya'o/ /blo gros chen po gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med du zin na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes
228a7(mdo 'grel): bsgrags pa med pas 'jug pa'ang med/ /ldog pa'ang med par 'gyur na/ blo gros chen po byis pa dang 'phags pa rnams la 'jug pa dang/ ldog pa yang yod de rnal 'byor can brtsen pa mi 'dod pa rnams bdag gi so so rang
228b1(mdo 'grel): gis rigs pa tshe 'di bde bar spyod pas gnas so/ /dro dang gsher dang sra g.yo bar/ /chos rnams byis pas rnam par brtags/ /yang dag ma yin sgro 'dogs te/ /mtshan nyid med cing mtshan gzhi med/ /rgyun rnams kyi ni lus 'di la
228b2(mdo 'grel): 'di ni rdzas brgyad gzugs yin te/ /lus kyi dbyibs dang dbang por ni/ /byis pa nor pa rnam rtog go /lus dang longs spyod gnas dag ni/ gzung ba'i rnam par rig gsum te/ /yid dang yid kyi rnam rig dang/ /rnam par rtog ni 'dzin pa gsum
228b3(mdo 'grel): rang gi sems la mngon chags pas/ /sems ni shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /phyi rol snang ba yongs med de/ /de yi phyir na sems tsam mo/ /dbang po rnams ni rgyu ma bzhin/ /yul rnams kyang ni rmi lam 'dra/ /byed dang las dang bya ba nyid//
228b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa kun tu g.yo ba yin/ /kun rdzob tu ni thams cad yod/ /dam pa'i don du yod pa min/ /gang 'di sna tshogs snang ba ni/ /gnas ngan len gyis bsgos pa'i sems/ /gzugs su snang ba 'dzin pa ste/ /phyi rol dag ni sems 'khrul pa//
228b5(mdo 'grel): snang ba ri bong rwa bzhin te/ /mi rnams kyi ni rnam rtog yod/ /smig rgyu la ni ri dwags bzhin/ /gang rnams rtog pa de dag nor/ /rnam rtog mngon par chags pa yin/ /rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung/ /phyi rol brtags pa'i rang bzhin te/ /gzhan
228b6(mdo 'grel): dbang rang gi gzhi las skyes/ /bdag la skyes pa'i 'khrul ma mthong/ /de yi sems rnams rab tu 'jigs/ /de yi rgyu can de la dmigs/ /yid mi 'jug pa'i gnas yin te/ /sems kyi rgyu yang 'byin par byed/ /rnam par shes kyang de la
228b7(mdo 'grel): gnas/ /dngos po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/ /phyi rol ji srid rnam rtog cing/ /rang gi nor pa ma mthong na/ /de srid du ni sems rgyas byed sa bag chags dag las sems mi byed/ /sems dang bag chags gcig ma yin/ /sems ni tha dad
229a1(mdo 'grel): ma yin mtshan/ /bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris/ /yid kyi shes las byung ba yi/ khag chags dri ma bzhin du ltos/ /sems ni ras yug dkar po 'dra/ /bag chags rnams kyis mi mdzes so/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i skabs nas
